column5: A*Men Eau de Parfum Seducing Offer
column7: Thierry Mugler is the French perfumier par excellence. This blockbuster aroma is a daring mix of bakeries, chocolatiers and hot tarmac, to name but three. How does it possibly work? I haven't a clue - but it assuredly does - in spades. Rich and powerful, it sits on the skin as friendly as balm. Sensual. Earthy. Yes, it's the matrix for other Mugler delights such as Pure Tonka/ Malt/ Leather/ Etc. Etc. but I keep on coming back to Numero Uno - The Classico. It lasts for ever, a constant reminder that whatever goes wrong at least you are smelling like a dream. Its undoubted masculine credentials enshrine a definite metrosexual vibe - altogether delightful. Oh how I love A*MEN. Amen.

I am a fan of Thierry Mugler fragrances, especially Pure Malt and A*Men. Recently, I ordered both online from http://www.mugler.co.uk but am really disappointed with the poor performance (longevity, silage and projection). After 1 hour the scent is gone!

A’men Pure Malt is one of the nicest male scents I have smelt in a long time.
By far, the Pure Malt is the nicest of the A’Men range. When ever my partner wears it, he always gets asked what aftershave he is wearing. Amazing value and a beautiful winter scent for men.

Lovely aftershave for autumn and winter.

Delivery okay, certainly not fast.
Only perfume samples and female gifts offered with purchase, why no make samples for customers buying aftershave?
Bought it for my son and he loves it, I think he's been converted to Mugler
I have enjoyed this product for some years now, very, very pleasing.
I used to think 'Million' was the best for comments but 'Amen Pure Malt' just gets heads turning as you walk into the room and ALL ask what it is.Well recommend.

The opening was disappointing, lots of alcohol smell (not the malt/boozy type) more like what you get from cheap perfume. 
After about 15m where the magic happened and it starts smelling really nice, not as strong as the original A*Men, less in your face and not as sweeter. Its for sure doesn't have the longevity of the original Amen
In total, I would say its a nice fragrance, a bit overestimated re the community hype, but still happy to have it and use it

HE SMELLS INCREDIBLE!! The smell has a kind of deep incense vibe going on which remaining very manly. It's a strong smell that last for ages... HOWEVER the bottle it comes in is horrendous. Far from being like the photo, it instead is a horrible beige cheap looking plastic and I was so disappointed. My other half also said he expected more. It looks terrible on the dressing table and far cheaper than any other perfume or aftershave bottle we own.

column7: Bought for my husband, who is a huge fan of original A Men. I am a perfume lover and I don't define perfumes feminine or masculine. Loved original as well , I thought it will be as good quality as its " father ". The perfume opens with a generic fresh burst, then goes through stage when you can smell the AMen DNA , then goes into something like Blue Jean's Versace. That's the dry down. We are both not impressed by it, will be back to buying original. However, it's good to have it in our collection.

This is really good starts out slightly green pine like then takes on a fresh almost cappuccino smell. It is fresh slightly sweet and not overpowering lingers on skin well.
This is quite easy to wear casual and for work and a casual evening out.
Great service, great samples and great gift daughter really pleased with it

column7: The shimmering body cream was my favourite absolutely gutted this has been changed have youse ever thought of doing both types as I can tell youse how disappointed I am the plain one is loverly but not a patch on the shimmering cream please bring it back please it’s luxury in a tub

I have used this cream for many years now

After experimenting a few times i have found the best results for me work by completely drying my hair and styling in usual way then i spray all over near to the ends then use straightners where sprayed for me this intencifies the product and i have used it with No perfume on and it lasts for hours.
Definatly a good purchase and would recommend to friends and family

I bought this product to go with the perfume I had already purchased for someone. They tell me that they use it everyday in the morning to wake the hair.

This product is so handy and instead of having to carry around my precious 90ml bottle I can have this smaller bottle; a perfect necessity for any handbag and that boost you need to make you feel fab. It is as powerful as the Eau de parfum and it really is a gorgeous scent. Also, you only need a little bit and it actually lasts all throughout the day and into the evening. Would highly recommend this product!!!

I adore Alien and Angel.

A luxurious treat .
Go on it's why you go to work!! Treat yourself ladies.

This perfume made me feel sexy and classy. The smell is the the most beautiful smell iv ever smelt. It lasts a long time and I can even small this whist bathing. ❤️ This purchase and it arrived early. My partner also loves this

Distinctive, seductive and the scent of positivity. This perfume is a must to make a woman feel good about herself. The scent mellows as the day / night goes on - giving a wonderful feeling of loveliness to all who wear it.
Absolutely gorgeous fragrance, would highly recommend ❤

definitely buying this one

Very disappointed as this is the first time I have gone direct to the manufacturer and not got the quality I paid for.

column6: A lovely parfum but "refillable for all eternity"?
column7:
My wife loves this eau de parfum and I like it on her.
We have bought numerous refills previously, but this time bought a complete new perfume bottle. The reason being that the mister / spray on the old one had become temperamental and what looked like pieces of perished rubber appeared around the spray head / slot.
I guess it isn't "refillable for all eternity".
This aside, we both like Alien Eau de Parfum enough to overlook this small problem. It is however, a great shame to have to send the old bottle to be recycled / landfill!
This was a Christmas pressie for my daughter in law, order process was quick and delivery was super , she was so happy with her pressie as it’s her favourite, ty for amazing service.
Love this product, it’s the best scent I’ve used that lasts all day.

This is my favourite perfume and was so please to receive the £10 off voucher code. The scent is worth every penny it's stunning and my family always no when I'm near they can smell my scent before they see me

I ordered alien as I heard thru a friend it was nice. Delivery was fast. And OMG when I opened it and sprayed for the first time. I fell in love with alien. My partner won't stop sniffing me as he says it's delish. I recommend anyone to buy this as it lasts such long time. One tiny spray lasts all day. Thanks mugler I love it x x

column6: Terrible waste of time and birthday ruined

Fresh subtle lingering scent gorgeous would definately highly recommend.
Only had it on practically 5minutes and two friends called wanting to know the name of the perfume

Thank you very much for the sample of Alien,I loved it.ive now put it on my Xmas list. Sarah Jane
I loved alien so.much i have just purchased a 60ml bottle the perfume lasts a long time and has a sweet rich smell. Very unique and plesant to wear
Lovely Smell That Lasted All Day I would Recommend To My Friends Even My Husband Commented On How Nice It Was!!!
I absolutely loved the smell so i can't wait to go out and purchase this amazing perfume..,, its at the top of my Christmas list :)

Love this perfume the smell last allday and you don’t need to put a lot on x

column6: This perfume makes a lady feel very feminine
column7: My sample of this perfume was wonderful, when I wore it I had so many compliments on the smell and was asked what it was. I t made me feel very feminine without being over powering.Fantastic product and would definitely recommend for any ladies who wish to feel special either daytime or to feel sensational on an evening out
This perfume was lovely long lasting would love a bottle for special occasions.
I absolutely love this perfume, it’s so unique and lasts for ages. Would definitely recommend it
Really lovely smelling perfume. Didn’t last all day but lasted a while
I loved this perfume. This was flowery and earthy and delightful. I would buy this.
Arrived quickly , great aroma and would recommend !!!
I would love to give a review but as of now I have not received any free sample for the above mentioned perfume
Love the perfume, but have not received my free offer - hope it is on its way!

This scent is lush and gorg. 
NOW I feel like a woman.

column6: Got this sample for my wife to try she loved it
column7: Got this sample for my wife to try she put it on and says it smells powerful and sensual she loves it and is going to get a bottle for christmas , she wanted me to order a bottle straight away but il save it for a prezzie for xmas will be ordering very soon
A delightful Scent, floral smell with fruity undertones. Not a heavy perfume I'm glad to say. Works very well for daytime wearing.
I used this perfume just once and the smell lasted for over a week. What a bargain and also it is to be experienced to be believed.
Alien Eau is a fantastic scent of very high quality and I would be very pleased to use it as I it enhances one's sense of well-being and confidence.
Very strong but smells lovely and lasts forever ideal for nights out rather then a daytime purfume
Absolutely beautiful perfume. Quite a strong, warm scent. Instantly recognisable and lasts all day with just a small amount. Love it.
WOW. Fabulous fragrance. I love it. Very powerful but very feminine

I was so pleased with my free sample! I adore the perfume and Alien is now my own personal favourite scent. I have already left hints with family and friends about the Alien gift sets and perfume I'd like to receive for my upcoming birthday!
Love love love this fragrance!!! Makes me feel confident and sexy. The fragrance lasts for ages and the bottle design is gorgeous. Definitely a new favourite of mine

Absolutely beautiful smell, was complimented on the perfume I was wearing every time I saw a new person! The scent lasted all day, and it stayed on my clothes until the next morning! I loved the perfume so much that I went to boots the day it run out and brought myself a bottle :)
I love love love this fragrance..unfortunatly too expensive for me.
This scent is warm and enchanting, seems to hug you and make everything yours. It last enough without fading in a different scent. If you want to feel sensual and empowered, you have to try it.
I loved the smell of Alien, it was subtle and not overpowering and I could still smell the wonderful aroma at the end of the day. The bottle looks fantastic too!
It is a fantastic fragrance, makes you feel empowering x

This is a wonderful dusky scent which is great to wear and the scent of it is gorgeous. 

I look forward to getting a larger bottle of it to enjoy.

column6: alien in name angel in nature
column7: What can I say, the name surely represents this perfume. It is clearly one of a kind, different to all others on the market. Fearless, enticing, fun and invigorating. Marks you with an air of confidence. A clear frontrunner in my weekend arsenal.

Brilliant for night and day, and not overly powerful.

Would definitely recommend
I thought the scent was a bit sweet for me initially but after a few minutes after application it settled down. I loved it
i got a sample of this for my wife to try and she loves it

natural body fragrance not over powering. Smells fresh clean . Invigerating ,
Makes me feel confedent through out the day
A really nice and wonderful sent my partner loves the smell and wears it all the time and has recommended to her friends.

This perfume smells divine! I couldn't stop smelling my wrist! It's a deep sensual scent, perfect for the evening! I absolutely love it and this is coming from someone who has stuck to another brand of fragrance for 10years, it's become my new favourite day or night!
It smells lovely and does not fade. I had many people compliment me when i was wearing this. Defo recommend lovely pressie as well.
I never have used a better fragrance , the scents last all day doesn’t fade, and it’s just a really lovely perfume. I definitely will keep using it.
My mother loved her free sample and said she will look to buy some more when finances allow it
It had a unique scent but it was still very feminine which I liked. It lasted all day and I simply loved it x
Feel like a princess when you spray on this heavenly scent. The perfume is out of this world & will ensure you stand out from the crowd. It’s a delicious blend of perfumes to tantalise your senses.
Fabulous exciting scent. Captivating and completely different to any I’ve had before.
Amazing smell everyone said how lovely it was lasted all day. Would definitely put it on my Christmas list.

I liked The Alien Perfume.I was.t sure about the title at first as I liked your Angel Perfume and the Title. I still think it ivery nice though and I would buy it despite the title.I like all Woody scents.
i received my sample of perfum but there was not even a drop of perfum in it,it was dry as a bone,i was so looking forward to trying it????
The fragrance is very nice I’ll definitely buy it again
I liked this perfume it had just enough musky tones and sweet aromas for my liking
The perfume is very luxurious and lasts a long time. I had a lot of compliments whilst wearing it.
What a fantastic perfume! The sambac jasmine tones make the perfume irresistible!!!
Can’t give a review on this perfume as I’ve not recieved my sample
My daughter liked this so much it has gone to the top of her Christmas list. A lovely uplifting fragrance with a touch of sass.
Used it and make me feel so good and fragranced so nice my whole day
Beautiful fragrance, long lasting scent, truly lovely, will definitely buy this
I love it,it smells lovely and it lasts all day I can still smell it on myself hours later and its definitely on my Christmas list.
a must have one of the greatest around this great aroma last forever

What can I say! My all time favourite perfume! It lasts all day or night and longer! I can still smell on my clothes even when they've been washed everyone compliments me and says how nice i smell when iv got it on.. which is all the time!! For me no other perfume compares because lets be honest we all want a good smelling long lasting perfume.. no-one wants to spend a small fortune on a lovely perfume to have to carry round all day.. you want it sat on your dresser pride of place looking lovely with the insurance that your going to smell as lovely as that bottle looks.

Love this perfume its not to strong a smell and the smell of the perfume lasts unlike alot of other branded ones i have purchased which fade after an hour I could still smell this after i finished my 7hr shift at work.

column6: Exquisite fragrance gets a bit addictive
column7:
I'd loved the smell of alien for a while.
I just didn't know what it was called. 
When I got my free sample I order a bottle straight away it's perfect for any occasion or a fantastic gift for that special lady.
It's wonderful. Only need to use lightly and it lasts all day, brilliant

Loved the smell would recommend 
really refreshing scent 
Would say it's for all ages 
All my friends loved it
Was so pleased when my sample arrived!! Was a little confused at the container but soon figured it out. Very attractive perfume and is one I will consider buying in the near future.
Having received my free sample i have told all my friends about..nice strong smell but not overpowering..could still smell it the next day..love it!!
Scent is very strong but it is nice, not my cup of tea but would defenatly buy it for a friend or family member, definitely worth the price

This is such a beautiful fragrance, I have had friends asking me what I was wearing.. its so head turningly fabulous. 
I've worn it out for afternoon lunch and shopping with friends and out on an evening with my partner... I have recommend it to many friends so don't miss out on a unique addition to your wardrobe.
Lovely sensual perfume with a lightness to wear day and night.

Absolutely love love love this.. a little goes a long way.. still smell it off my scarf a few days later.. plus so my compliments about my lovely perfume.. it’s just so fresh and crisp and such a unique scent!

This fragrance is not only gorgeous but it is also strong and long lasting. It easily lasts 12 Horus plus which is amazing for a female perfume. It is sweet without being overpowering and the bottle is attractive too.

Last week I was having dinner in Nando's and one of the waitresses was wearing a gorgeous perfume, I got a whiff of it each time she walked passed our table. First I thought it was Olympea but when I asked her which perfume she had on, she said it was called "Alien". Funny enough, the next day I got my Alien sample in the post and used it straight away. My verdict: this is definitely going on my Christmas wish list!

My alien sample arrived and I was so excited to try it 
Opened it up , loved the packaging that the sample came in 
I then went to spray and the sample didn’t work :( 
Nothing was coming out , I was soo disappointed!!

First off, how cool is the sample packaging? I may he easily pleased or whatever, but I was impressed! 
The perfume itself was devine! Just that one little sample spray lasted a whole night out. I get abit cautious of buying perfumes that are abit over budget without actually trying them first, I like to know if I'm going to get my money's worth, and with Alien I am most certain I will be. It's most definitely going to be added to my dressing table very soon!
I thought this sample was sensual ,musky , and downright beautiful
Amazing perfume. Feminine yet strong. Sweet buy not sickly. Basically all woman
Nice smelling Parfum, would make a nice gift for someone but it's not my kind of preferred scent..
The perfume lasts all day and smells AMAZING. The compliments I get from the perfume are amazing and my friends know me by this scent now. It's my favourite thing to wear! Love, love, love.

I recently purchased alien as I was looking for a new fragrance, I have been wearing Womanity for about 4 years and absolutely adore it, but as it has been discontinued I had to try and find something that makes me feel as special as womanity. I purchased alien the fragrance is lovely I had lots of comments. I do really like alien, not as much as womanity, but it is really nice.
I never recieved my sample so i cant really review a product i haven't yet smelt
Awesome scent, really smells nice haha, would recommend it
I got this sample for my wife, in her words “it’s heavenly “, can’t say anymore

I really liked the fragrance it has a sort of a spicy wooden scent to it I think it's more a fragrance I would wear more in the colder weather it is a powerful smell but not overpowering i haven't came across anything else like it which is what I like it is different
Why did I get an email saying hope you enjoyed g when I didn’t receive anything
Great freebie sample system for a perfume I never would have considered othereisr. Phenomenal unique scent, really striking and utterly beautiful.

Alien is the only perfume i have wore since i was 17 i am 30 now the first time i used it was at my place of work a customer in the hairdressers used it and all i done was smell her and compliment the perfume and she suprised me with the biggest bottle i have seen and was over the moon and now have never used any other perfume every birthday christmas mothers day i get bottles and giftsets and never have i been dissapointed what would be amazing is a candle range the smell is just beautifull and it qould be a total sucsess the alien range is classic
I absolutely loveeeeed this perfume is actually one of my favourite perfumes . It makes me feel happy, confident and sexy. Would definitely recommend this

The fragrance lasted very well...still the hint of it the following morning.

I sent off for a free sample of this perfume and my daughter absolutely loves it and wants a bottle for Christmas so thanks for the sample and for her being able to try it before I buy. So please don't I decided to send off for it

column6: Alien is out of this world
column7:
Wasn’t certain my partner would like this but she absolutely loves 
it,fresh new wonderful fragrance she can’t stop wearing 
Going to cost me in the long run,haha
Not sweet, nice slightly spicy, mysterious, sensual . First perfume I really like!

This is the nicest smelling perfume ever, I wear it daily and get complimented on how mince the smell is, one spray can last all day, I love the fact that when I'm running low I can refill my bottle, that's not very often as it last me for months, highly reccommended for a morning noon and night fragrance lovely for all occasions

Loved the sample an went out and bought a full sI've bottle thank you for the sample
This perfume smell amazing, it's a sexy sweet beautiful smell. Loved Loved Loved this perfume! I would most definitely be purchasing a bottle of this and will also recommend to everyone I no.

This has the most wonderful smell and I hope to get a bottle soon x
Loved the Devine smell rich and luxurieours perfume
Can't review as it never turned up, so unable to give an opinion

This is a perfume like no other that is so sweet smelling and is a joy to wear that captures your imagination and arouses attention.
Mugler alien Will be best of my all perfum , I like to try more because 1 sample was not enough, please ;)

This fragrance is unlike anything I’ve worn before, smells amazing, had to fight my daughters for it!
Beautiful ❤❤ I loved this sample I shall be buying this perfume

Very sensual smelling perfume. Scent lasts for quite a long time. Very good quality. Beautiful bottle, looks expensive

Love it so much only share it with my man my little alien eetestinvasion with its jewel shaped bottle and sw notes of Jasmine the signature flower of locri in capable of capturing the smoothest of suitors in Italy from the trendiest squirt to the biggest imo better believe the power of the Santo wood musky a bit husky but not all that fussy about study the stussy so send me the biggest bottle you have please I deserve it and so does my aunt in fact is just for me this review is still too short you keep telling me I didn't know Amber smelt I thought it was a stone usually on a ring or necklace but it does so it's white hot like a polar stare of looking at a full lunar scholars better believe the power of the wolf it's the proof the winds are howling through the roof of the cottage the alien slumbering in it's jewel shaped cocoon
I love the smell , i sprayed it in the morning and hours lately still smelt strong . I would but this and recommend.
Mugler alien is by far the best perfume I have worn, it smells fantastic and the scent lasted all day. Im hooked!!

Awesome Parfum. I loved it. Bought one from the Parfum shop. Thank you

I dident receive a free sample so cannot review it

I think I've found my new favourite perfume, this is definately at the top of my Christmas list.
Lovely fragrance with a very feminine scent. Definitely going to buy some.

I am 59yrs old and I love my perfumes and the bottles they come in, there's nothing better on a dresser than a beautiful perfume bottle even better if the perfume in side smells wonderful like Alien. ;if a perfume smells right your remembered by your work colleagues family &friends for wearing it and l have no problem for being remembered for wearing Alien

Bought this last minute sales assistant recommended, gorgeous individual smell, will definitely be buying again one of my new favourites

column6: An out of this world experience
column7: A long lasting and luxurious perfume. Rich and fragrant yet not ovrrpowering. Truly unique.Set apart from other fragrances. Alien.

column6: do women want to be aliens
column7: I have worn your perfume before..but one time ..was asked if i was wearing aftershave..with this ..smells to me like cloying old lady scent..whats in there..do you know..do you care..you better as nobody else will

This perfume had a lovely scent that lasted quite a long time. Even friends commented on it and liked it.

column6: This perfume is so unique smells like no other
column7: If you want to smell different and fresh this is for you

This will be going on my Christmas list it was delightful to wear
never got my sample,envelope arrived ripped with no sample :(
I never did receive a sample so unable to review. Please can this be arranged

receiving my sample in a cute but amazing sample case I was very impressed.
The scent is not too heavy or too strong a smell. Very refreshing smells amazing. Will save for special occasions. I’ve worn it a few times and have be asked what perfume I have on. So I think it’s a yes will definitely recommend.
Absolutely love this fragrance it stays on all day and smell lasts

Absolutely love this perfume! I feel glamorous and feminine whenever I wear it. Gets lots of compliments. Have tried others but keep coming back to this one. Definitely my signature scent from now on!
Lovely scent I will definitely be buying some more of this .

Very nice parfum , thanks:) I very like and recommended..

lovely day/night fragrance that I will continue to wear

This perfume whilst wearing ALIEN is soft, gentle, strong and people notice when your around, it's the smell of delight.
It was such a nice smell loved it perfume is very nice would buy in future

I am not a big perfume sort of person but thisl sample was a freebie so decided to try it.
I have got to say that this0 perfume is absolutely beautiful the scent ia so engaging and long lasting.
If i was able to afford to buy this perfume i most definetely would buy it
MY favourite perfume ever!! So unique and long lasting I just love it x

Was given a sample to test and loved it! Very sensual small that lasted more than a day even after wash. Decided to buy. Thank you mugler!

I tried this perfume looks lovely but I think it's for the older generation I don't no why but it reminds me of the lil old ladies going off out to bingo on a Saturday afternoon not saying it's a nasty perfume just not one the younger generation would use

This is the best and nicest smelling perfume.
It's all I've used since the first time I bought it. Would not buy anything else.
Highly recommended xx

column6: Its a perfect name for afragrance out of the world
column7: I love this perfume have worn it since it appeared will gon wearing it till i die

Have to admit to being dubious on using Alien, as having smelt it on others i feared it would be too strong for my liking. I have been totally surprised and I love it. I used it during the day and even my partner commented. Will definitely use it again
I was given a free sample and really loved the smell. I wore it whilst having dinner with friends and was complimented. My friends have now purchased it.
This is far the best perfum ever made , all my friends and daughters wear it and we all love it
This fragrance is hands down the best!! The smell is just unbelievable and forever lasting once sprayed. Will be my forever favourite and Perfect for any occasion
Got a sample for the wife and she loves it. What she doesn't know is there is a bottle hidden as her birthday is a few weeks away
Such a lovely fragrance and is very long lasting. Will be buying again
Don’t know if I had a defective sample, but I couldn’t smell anything!
Beautiful strong scent that lasts for hours, ive always used this perfume for years and still love it. Defiantly worth the money and great for youthful women. Highly recommend!
Purchased this perfume for my wife's wedding day and every time I smell it I get reminded of that wonderful day
Such a great new product love wearing this and will be buying more
It has a ovely long-lasting sent, one of my favourites.

From the moment I sprayed my first spray I realised it was a scent for me. It has a lot of strong character smells that last which is everything you want for a signature scent. It doesn't fade or change over time and a little goes a very long way.
this is one the best perfumes i have had for a long time. if it was on sale, i would definitely buy it

Alien is my all time favourite perfume I don't use anything else but can't afford it to keep buying it but I always request a bottle for my birthday and for Christmas, I tell my daughter who is 22yrs old if she has not bought me it then don't expect christmas dinner haha, joking aside I love it and love getting told how lovely I smell when wearing it and I always say...Alien it's the best.
I love the perfume Alien. When I wear it I always get comments on how nice it smells. I always make sure I have some left and I never run low on it.
LOVE LOVE LOVE this perfume. Lasts all day. Constantly get complimented.

column6: Alien eau de Parfum by Mugler
column7: I loved this perfum, it was very nice, something that could be worn at any time. I have certain perfumes I only wear during the day and other perfumes that I only use at night, this particular fragrance can be worn at any time, nice and fresh, not too heavy or overpowering, definitely one I will be buying and encouraging friends to try.
Beautiful perfume,lasted all day,very luxurious,a very confident strong scent
This perfume is absolutely gorgeous my wife really loves it the smell is beautiful.
Perfume smells lovely and doesn't fade it is very distinctive and everyone kept commenting on my perfume
A lovely perfume always makes me feel good when wearing also gets lots of compliments
I received a little package and was wondering what it was, when I open it and smelt the smell it was was so nice I kept one smelling my wrist. It’s a must try
This product was a nice smell and lasted a long time would buy as presents for family and friends
Absolutely love this fragrance,refillable bottles are absolutely awesome, first choice for me
This is such a sexy perfume , my husband loved it.
What a beautiful fresh smelling perfume! Perfect for all occasions
I love it. I think all of you perfumes smell heavenly
Absolutely love it ...top of my Christmas list this year ....thank you for letting me try the sample
Wow what a perfume. Absolutely gorgeous. Fantastic fragrance. So intense. Once you have sprayed once its got you in its grip!

Thrilled to receive a sample, thank you. The envelope smelt lovely when I opened it. The perfume is not an overpowering fragrance but a long lasting fragrance and could be worn day or night. I loved it.
Apparently I was sent a sample to try....that never came!
Lovely soft fragrance that’s lasts all day .. would definitely recommend anyone to buy it

Such a pretty and multifaceted scent. Suits me perfectly, makes me feel feminine and like I've made an effort yet it's a perfume I can see myself wearing almost any time because it isn't a sickeningly sweet smell and doesn't make me feel 'overdone' when just on the school run or at work for example. I really struggle finding scents that work with me as opposed to being added to me and this is only the second perfume I've ever been happy with. Wish I'd tried it years ago.

I refuse to wear anything else after Alien as no other perfume comes close! 
It smells beautiful and stays on throughout the day!
Love this perfume, so feminine, always get complimented on the scent. Definitely now a favourite.

I'm not usually keen on very strong perfumes but I absolutely love Alien. 
The scent is unmistakeable and very sexy. The eau de parfum lasts for a long time and remains exotic when it wears down to a more subtle tones through the day.
This perfume has a strong but magical scent which was complimented on when wearing it , definitely a favourite now

Sent off for your free sample !! Cannot miss out on the best par fum around ALIEN ..sorry to say we never received the free sample just yor letter which was open ..it must be very popular as some sad tea leaf has had my sample ! .there is probably some bloke from the sorting office helping himself to your ALIEN samples and now has enough to refill his wife's empty parfum for free ..WHAT A TIGHT THIEVING C... .THANKS IAN CRAWFORD .
I love the scent this perfume gives off. Lasts ...
This is a pleasant fragrance. Could be worn all day, rather than just evening.
Most of my friends were buying Angel and seemed to be excited. I went for Alien and I felt the same, it has become my favorite.
Would recommend this to anyone, long lasting smell which you can smell all day!.. even having comments on my purfume! 100% recommend
Got to say, this is just beautiful! A fragrance that is so unique and classy. It lasts on my skin and the complements that I got were wonderful. Definitely buying this

column6: My favourite perfume scent this year
column7: Received a free sample of the alien eau de perfum and the scent is absolutely divine. It's not too strong and not to sweet, just the perfect mixture.
This is a great perfume if you want to feel like a woman, had quite a few compliments telling me I smelled gorgeous. Trust me you feel like a woman
I have been buying mugler products for a number of years for my wife, she loves alian and the scent is very appealing.
This smells AMAZING. Lasts for hours and smells just like it has been sprayed. Love it and highly recommend

It’s screams expensive taste.
And even the travel size bottles are so cute. It’s got the whole package.
A delightful scent ideal for an impact on a night out.
Really very nice smell and strong enough that you only need a little Defo recommended also il be buying more I love it!
was unsure when I first tried it but as I got use to the smell I loved it. would definitely buy this.
A really feminine scent that leaves you feeling confident and classy! Long lasting and all in a beautiful bottle.. what more could you ask for? I think I’ve just found my new favourite scent.

column6: Alien review, out of this world!
column7: From the moment the scent hits your skin, the aroma is so distinctive, and so fresh, it brings a smile to your face, and a spring to your step! Delicious, crisp and a lot of fun!

This will most certainly be a top contender amongst my favourite perfumes, with a very feminine sexy scent. It can be seductive for evenings but does also make a lovely daytime scent as although its strong its not over powering.
very nice smell fresh is not suffocating i really like it
Really nice fragrance, long lasting and luxurious smell.
I love this fragrance it is now definitely one of my favourites, The smell lasts all day & I was asked by multiple people which fragrance I was wearing.

The sample came really quick and a good size sample. The smell is amazing very floral it lasts all day which is great you can use it as a day perfume for work. I like to use it on an evening as well as the smell lasts the evening without reapplying. I am also a big fan of the bottle design. I would recommend people try the fragrance as it's light aroma is very subtle but long lasting
love it long lasting makes me feel out of this world
To be honest there wasn't much in it I only got a tiny squirt on my finger but it did smell very nice I adore this scent and will be buying in the future
I love the smell and bottle this will definitely going on my Xmas list for me.Thank you very much for my sample.most of my friends asked what it was I was wearing.

Hello, I've bought an Alien perfume, 90 ml, refillable talisman, from an online shop and on my perfume box it says only ALIEN with purple and MUGLER with gold caps letters. On my older products box it says Therry Mugler with a hand writing, instead of just MUGLER with a caps font. Is it my perfume genuine?

column6: Would have been lovely to try the sample...
column7: I requested a sample of Alien as I already love Angel, and I was pleased I got one... until I opened the sample. The design of the perfume sample is majorly flawed, all you have to do is pull the tab and squeeze to spray onto your skin. But travelling in the envelope it does through the postal system means that when you receive the sample and try it, it's empty. Disappointed is not even cutting it! Perhaps the old school little bottle in the cardboard would at least allow people to try the sample and maybe buy the product. I didn't get to try the sample so I'm still unsure whether the fragrance suits me!
Always been a fan since 1996. so different from all others.

All in all I may just let someone treat me to the full size version someday soon!

Would definitely recommend xx

column6: Can't get enough of the aroma

I love this purfume as I have been using it a while now has such a lovely sent and stays fresh all day

Best fragrance yet, smells amazing!! Moved to the top of my favourite list
I absolutely love the smell ,it lasted for so long
A Beautiful, Ethereal fragrance that invokes imagery of galaxies, far, far, away.

Thierry Mugler perfumes are a must for all women. I am always getting asked which perfume I have on.

This is a fabulous fragrance everyone asks what are you wearing. My husband loves the smell, so a big thank you Mugler.
Keep up the great work it's so beautiful.
The fragrance lasts and you smell it when you enter and leave the room, can't beat it.
Fab and thank you for the free samples Very much appreciated.
Absolutely love this fragrance and lasts all day x

I can be quite picky when it comes to new scents because I've always liked the same ones but after trying this I honestly fell in love it smelt beautiful even my partner commented on how nice it smelt it's not to strong of a scent but strong enough to last all day and still smell as if you had just put it on honestly I can't rate this enough it's a gorgeous scent and now one of my favourites
Absolutely amazing smell that is long lasting wows
I would love to review this product but I didnt receive a free sample!
I love this parfume. Is in my top 5,long lasting and great smell.

This perfume smells divine, it has the uniqueness all Muglar perfumes has. Im a big fan of Angel and it will always be a favourite but Alien is definitely added to the the favourite list. It smells sensual and rich and the scent lasts a very long time.
I liked the packaging and the fragrance was good for Thierry Mugler Brand, it has a strong scent and it lives up to its reputation, strange, strong and alluring.

column6: Scent didn't seem to last long
column7: I don't know if it was because it was a sample but the scent seemed to disappear after a short while whereas some other perfumes can last all day. The smell was lovely though.
Tried free sample really really lovely I use Angel but will buy this as well
Beautiful perfume Smells lovely and flowery. It's gives a sense of intrigue

I found this perfume a gorgeous scent,luxurious and evocative. It's the kind of scent you can wear all day and into the evening. The bottle is beautiful looks fantastic on your dressing table.But the scent is a feminine, spicy and delicious perfume.

column6: alien truly out of THIS WORLD!
column7:
Fantastic smell,encapsulates a femanine musky smell that really does last all day, making you feel sexy and well...ailien, but in a good way!!!
I go with MY moods some day's I'm feeling alien,some.Angel.
Whatever it's ALWAYS Mugielier!
I received my alien eau de perfume I absolutely loved the smell it stays on all day I definitely be buying a big bottle ,

I haven't received my free sample ! !
So I can't tell if I like it or not !

Would definitely buy.
This was different, I wasn't keen initially, but after about half an hour, it was amazing

column6: Sophisticated, with an air of mystery.
column7: I simply love this perfume. It makes me feel glamorous, sophisticated and mysterious at the same time. Perfect for a serious night out, it turns heads!
Exotic!! Left a lovely smell in the room. Will definitely purchase.

Beautiful, elegant fragrance, that's strong and lasts!

column6: I'm now the proud owner of Alien
column7: I love it, what a beautiful smell and one that lasted the morning after the night before, lots of compliments and lots of friends going out to purchase a bottle.. and me myself am a proud owner of Alien, my husband surprised me with a bottle, so Thank you..
This perfume has a nice strong smell , love it would recommend it to my friends
New different fresh and long lasting and in handy sizes
Lovely smelling perfume long lasting, everyone's asked what my perfume was
I absolutely love the smell of this an the free sample was good
Absolutely fantastic. Smells amazing and lasts a long time. Not too strong, just the right amount. My boyfriend also enjoyed smelling it on me.
Absolutely Amazing perfume. The scent lasted and I got lots of compliments and people asking what scent I was wearing
I'd been wanting to try this for ages and I wast disappointed when I did. The smell is divine and last for ages! Would highly recommend

Thank you so much for my sample it really made my day special x
Really loved all the notes in this soothing but prominent very complex.
Have to buy another bottle as have already finished the other such a lovely lasting smell.

Loved this and will be buying a bottle for my self
its a very nice parfume, one of my favorite at this moment, thank you for sending me sample
One of my favourite perfumes, the scent lasts all day, very feminine.

As a long time follower of the fashion side of the House of Mugler, I confess to being a little late to the party with regards to the fragrance range. As a fragrance lover, I was delighted to get the chance to sample Mugler Alien Eau De Parfum recently and found this fragrance to be the embodiment of contemporary femininity with sultry, sumptuous notes of White Amber and Jasmine Sambac. With Cashmeran Wood adding deep, dulcet decadence, this fragrance embraces sensual elegance and modern mystery.

Most definitely recommend.
What an amazing smell as soon as l opened my free gift l new this perfume was for me, can't wait till my birthday to get a full size bottle.
Stunning perfume! Smells wonderful and was commented on it a number of times that day! Would highly recommend.

I was a big fan of Angel Innocent for years until it was discontinued. After trying other perfumes i was delighted to receive Alien as a tester and i love it!! I now have this on my must have list and will enjoy it!!

Cannot give a review on this perfume as I have sadly not yet received it.Hopefully it will arrive soon.Thank you.Doreen Waite.ps I know when I try Alien it will be another favourite to recommend to friends.
I absolutely adore this perfume, it lasts for hours and I get lots of compliments on how lovely I smell
This perfume is absolutely beautiful . And such a long lasting fragrance.
Loved this small sample squeezed it until it could be squeezed no more!!!!
A beautiful strong, non sweet fragrance which lasts all day.
this perfume was beautiful.Ive always been a fan of Angel but now i think it will be Alien.

Absolutely beautiful made me feel so special and glamorous

The fragrance lasts all day & night, it never fades unlike other perfumes. 
I loved it that much that I've purchased a full, 30ml bottle, including the body lotion & shower gel.. 
Thank you Mugler for an amazing perfume, that I will continue to buy...
Absolutely love it fantastic for a night out and not to over powering for every day wear

I received my sample in the post and you could smell it before I opened it, I went out for the day so thought I would try my sample it smelt really great and made me feel good , I absolutely love it and I found it lasted all the time I was out and could still smell it in the evening I would highly recommend this
After buying angel for a good few years.i was looking for a new perfume to take its place.nothing I tryed could compare any where near to angel.that is till alien came along. Problem solved. Jude

Wished I could

I would love to review the sample but nothing came out of it? i could slightly smell the package but there was nothing to test. From the slight smell of the packet i think i would have liked it but can't really give an honest review xx
Beautiful perfume, now a firm favourite. Strong but not overpowering. Perfect for a night out. Although I wear mine whenever I choose as I love it!
It's one of my favourite all time fragrances and I always get asked what I'm wearing. Not too sweet not too flowery just perfect
Beautiful fresh smelling perfume,the husband was giving this as an item on my gift list for Christmas,lovely

I have received my Alien sample as requested and am happy to say it's out of this world! I loved it so much that I went straight out and bought some. Totally alien to my normal character. I welcome all further samples to broaden my horizons!
Too expensive to buy very often which is a shame, but I love the lingering fragrance, especially the jasmine notes. Rich and sensuous and it suits my skin.
Lovely fragrance that didn't wear off, devine musky scent, lots of friends, family and work colleagues commented on how nice I smelt. I shall definitely be purchasing this.
Lovely scent that lasts, very feminine, distinctive smell would highly recommend

column6: Alien eau de parfum, strong and unique fragrance
column7: The perfume can be recognised immediately with its stunning intense fragrance. This is my go to perfume for a night out as the fragrance is simply stunning and it's striking fragrance lasts all night. Captivating and truly alluring fragrance which envelops the skin.
Love this perfume, such lovely fragrance and unlike some others this lasts all day. Angel has always been my favourite but so pleased to have found a new favourite. Thank you so much.
Beautiful new scent. Quite floral with a musky undertone
This perfume smells great and the scent lasts for hours after you have sprayed. Thumbs up all round.
Absolutely stunning fragrance! Lasts all day, still smells amazing hours after! Beautifully bottled, highly recommend this fragrance!
The Smell very lovely, keep all day long, love it!
Absolutely love this fragrance but unfortunately a little above my budget but i will definitely recommend it to others
Great product. A long lasting, lovely fragrance. Will definitely buy again

I received a free sample of Mugler's Alien in the post. I'm very fussy when it comes to choosing perfume & finding one that I like. I instantly loved the smell of Alien and will be purchasing a bottle as soon as I can!
Alien is my favourite perfume, I get compliments when I wear it

I was sent a sample to try (which I'm very thankful for) as it was lovely. Perfume is such an individual thing so I'd recommend trying it yourself, but personally I really enjoyed the smell and felt the advertising is intriguing.
Unfortunately I could not sample this one as my sample would not work. I went to boots instead and had a generous spray..... on both wrists. Did not last very long (I think Boots water it down!!!)
I found it really fresh and feminine and the aroma lasted for ages but my sample took feet as my daughter inlaw was so impressed with the smell she had to have it so all in all very impressive
Lovely warm notes in this fragrance, it is distinctive and several people asked me what it was. It's become a firm favourite, it lasts well on my skin too
My favourite perfume but the sample just wasn't enough

I cannot get enough of this fragrance, to me, its lovely and i feel great wearing it. I even bought Alien body lotion. I also love the way the bottle has been designed. I will keep buying this, as this is my favourite perfume.

I love this perfume I brought it originally for my daughter who had trouble finding a perfume that stayed on her for more than a hour this is now her signature perfume. She brought me the little stone one first and I myself now love this perfume I tried to give it five stars ✨ but it would not let me. My favourite perfume used to be Chanel no 5 but now it is Alien
Really lovely fragrence, long lasting. Would recommend, .nothing else is similar

Stunning fragrance would definitely recommend and I am definitely going to invest in some for my holiday!!! Only down side was the actual sample received not enough!!!

I have tried this product. It is sensational. It makes you feel like a film star. 
The fragrance of Jasmine.Cashmere Wood and White Amber is out of this world. It makes you feel as though you can tackle anything that this world throws at you but at the same time makes you feel as though you are more of a woman.
Love love love!!! ❤️❤️❤️ Everyone is always commenting inny perfume!
Liked the sample some much I bought it at duty free

column6: Was complimented on my scent multiple times!
column7:
A new one for me, having been loyal to armani for years I was keen to try something new but was hesitant to buy as money's tight these days! 
A free sample was just what I needed and this was no disappointment. The scent was fresh and exotic and long lasting. I could still smell this on my clothes after a very long day at work. My colleagues commented on my new smell (they liked it!) and the kids I work with (who have learning difficulties) weren't upset that I no longer smelled the same!
I will be asking for this on birthdays and at Christmas.
I'd love to be able to leave a review saying how much I loved the perfume but I've never smelt it. The bottle is gorgeous.

I loved this fragrance so much i qent and bought a bottle definetly my go to fragrance now works well for the day or on a night out and have had so many compliments on how it smells even somone recognised it from walking past !!!
I adore this perfume, after getting a sample i rushed out to buy a bottle. So many compliments, and long lasting, was still strong the next morning.
I got this as a sample and cant wait to make purchase on pay day. It smells devine and lasts all day. My oartner even commented and he never usually

Absolutely a gorgeous fragrance, I just found that the sample could be a bit bigger, maybe a small 3ml bottle as a sample, as the sample sent out had just a bout one squirt!!, but happy to say I have already gone out and purchased my 30ml bottle. Thank you so much for the sample

I ordered a sample of this perfume for the wife because as all blokes know you cant just go on your own sense of smell. Aint i glad i did, she loved it and 1 full bottle later i have a very pleased wife and my brownie points have increased. The scent is very pleasant on the nostrils and there has been some interest of her friends on what her perfume is. All in all a very nice perfume and highly recommended

column6: Alien mugler a simply stylish and elegant perfume

This was absolutely gorgeous-really loved it and will be buying some!

I loved the sample and even better the little sample what you can pop up for a quick spray. Thanks
I thought this would be a young persons scent but after wearing for a few hours - decided I was going to be converted and it would be the next one to buy
I love this perfume it's my favorite ..I've tried to make an order of Alien but I couldn't because it says there that you don't deliver in the town that I live,I was so upset about that!
I am not usually able to wear perfume as they make me feel ill but I absolutely love Alien. Smells amazing.

The smell is gorgeous. While i was out shopping a lady came up to
Me and asked what perfume i was wearing, told her Alien.
i loved this purfume.i had a sample. i'm hoping Santa will buy me some h aha
I'm now totally in love with this perfume , angel used to be my favourite but not any more , I'm hoping to try a few others to see what they are like but so far you cant get better than alien xx

I ordered a sample as I don't like smelling before I try this perfume is Devine it's smells really nice and I'm now saving to buy some. The sample arrived quicker than expected I would defiantly recommend if you are unsure about the smell thank you so much for the sample

I have been a fan of mugler ever since I first had "angel" which was all time scent for a long time I didn't think that I would find another one to top it (I still love it!) or come close let alone by the very same one that bought that to me, but I have to say that "alien" has actually made it to my top spot!! It has the most beautiful alluring scent which lasted all day possibly longer if I didn't shower every evening! I also received numerous comments about it asking what it was and how lovely it smelt, so please try it for yourselves you WONT be disappointed.

Alien is a stunning, unique, provocative scent that turns heads & noses & leaves an alluring trail behind you wherever you go.
Both men & women cannot help but comment on this gorgeous perfume
I was getting compliments all day on how good I smelt. So fresh and not at all over powering. I love it.
First time I have worn mugler but have out it on my birthday list I was very impressed
Lovely scent and stays all day. Definitely at the top of my birthday wish list.
Such a beautiful scent that had it brought for me as a birthday gift

I absolutely love this perfume my favourite,, I will be buying again I've had my big bottle refilled 4 times so far since discovering it I would highly recommend it and have recommended it to all my friends and family
I would love to write a review, but I never received a sample of this perfume .

Looking forward to trying the new aura also and seeing if it's just as beautiful as alien is

It smells absolutely gorgeous.
Myself and both of my daughters will definitely purchase this perfume in the future.

ALIEN IS An all time favourite of mine and my daughters smelt it a few years ago and always go back to it ,Really think the sample could of been bigger thoigh thats the thing with mugler not very generous with their samples.Gorgeous jasmine and Amber fragrance and good sillage and longevity ,can guarantee the compliments with this one .
gorgeous scent ideal feminine memorable scent perfect blend of elements
Such a light and refreshing scent for day or evening
This by far is my favourite perfume, perfect for daytime and evening.
I received a sample and I love the smell of this and the smell lasts for a long time. I will defiantly be purchasing this.
I love this perfume and always get comments when wearing it

It's floral but not subtle,just the way I like to wear it.
It's out of this world
This is subtle and warm fragrance but strong at the same time, lasts long on skin and leaves aromatic mist behind you.
I love alien, I bought 2 bottles! Love it. Can wear daily or for nite

The first time I smelt Alien was when I was in Hospital. I asked the nurse what her perfume was and have never forgotten that smell. I received a free sample and WOW! No more Gucci for me .....I am now an Alien addict... I absolutely love it and won't wear anything alse

Not only was this perfume beautiful (I am very picky when it comes to smells) but the perfume lasted for a long period of time. I noticed people would comment on how nice it was and even ask what the perfume was. Would highly recommend to anyone. Will deffo be buying some and putting it on my Birthday/Christmas list.
Thank you for the sample of Alien perfume. It has the most gorgeous smell, even my partner noticed. It's my birthday soon and the order is in!!!!
I tried this sample and didnt tell me husband what purfume i was wearing and he couldnt keep away! I smelt devine!!!!
I have not recieved this sample yet so I can not give a review

I not only tried the samply but had to go and buy myself a bottle of this perfume because it's absolutely amazing , there no other that can match it , itsso strong and lasts very long and is exactly what i want :)
Such a Devine scent! Always get compliments on how delicious the scent is and lasts all day and night.
It Smells amazing and would definitely recommend it.

I bought this for my daughter for her 18th and had it personalised with her name, the engraving is lovely I'd highly recommended it. As it's refillable she will always have it as a birthday keep sake she absolutely loved it!

Great product and great service. 5 star rated 
Brought as a present for the other half as she loves Alien.
I would recommend

I love this perfume. It's great in eau de parfum and also eau de toilette. I have used it for years and it's my favourite of all theMugler range. Great service excellent quality. And I got some freebies when ordering online which you don't get in shops - nice touch - bonus!
may favourite perfum ever. I do have a limited addition perfume also from yourselves that I can only get from the airport its in a gold bottle I think it may be majestique. Both are amazing :)

I have previously bought the eau de toilette and loved it but decided to pay a little more to get the eau de parfum and have not regretted it.
The fragrance is perfect and it lasts for ages

Delivered within 2 days and included a free personalised inscription on the bottle! My wife loved it.

Great free items with the perfume :)

I'm sure this bottle will be gettting filled over and over.
The wife loved this, and I love it on her. It it one of the best on the market.
The fragrance is so captivating and long lasting. It's such a nice bottle and am very pleased how quick the purchase was delivered.
A truly Wonderfull intimate Fragrance. A special Product.
Beautiful recomendet for frend , , , , , , , , , , , ,
column28: 8 Chapel Wood, Llanedeyrn, Cardiff CF23 9EE, UK

column7: I ordered alien and when ordering it said choose three free gifts when they did not come and I questioned them they said my order was under £60 so I wouldn't receive so why let me choose the gifts and add them to my basket then when I'd paid and received them they said my order wasn't enough so watch what you are doing

Ordered within the advised delivery window for XMAS as a present for my wife chased the order as internet said processing, ordered directly plenty of times however they could not process the order due to a malfunction on their system for processing the order. Promised an apology item delivery now Jan 7th and no notification poor show I feel for an international company who has always delivered promptly in the past.
Excellent product at a good price, the engraved message on the bottle made it a special gift.

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum & Eco Refill Set
column7: I've been wearing this perfume for a while now and I really like it, it's long lasting and I'm always being told I smell good. Would also recommend Thierry Mugler for excellent service.

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum & Eco Refill Set
column7:
My wife's favourite perfume direct from mugler at a better price than I can buy it in the shops. For 81 quid I got 60ml refillable bottle and 2 60ml refills.
 The perfume smells great not to overpowering but long lasting. Put it on when you go out and it will last the night with out needing for it to be top it up. Also very quick delivery.

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum & Eco Refill Set
column7:
Very nice set with refills and funnel ideal gift
Long lasting super fragrance nice to be able to fill instead of travelling to perfume shop to refill.
A+

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum & Eco Refill Set
column7: I am huge fan of this perfume and was delighted to see a set at a fantastic price. The delivery was slow but this was down to me ordering over the new year period when there were no Royal Mail deliveries so had to wait a bit longer. It was definitely worth the wait! Go on treat yourself!

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum & Eco Refill Set
column7: i have always loved the smell of Alien and was waiting for the Xmas sales. Just by chance I thought why not go direct to Muglers website and I'm SO glad I did. I saw the offer and thought no way do u get a 60ml and 2 60ml refills. I thought even so 2 60ml refill bottles still a good price. Delivery was super fast during Xmas time aswell only took a day or two. when it arrived I was over the moon that you actually get 180ml in total. absolutely recommend this to anyone who loves Alien well worth the price.

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum & Eco Refill Set
column6: Alien must buy set great value for money
column7: This is the best value set from Alien I have ever seen and purchase, not only do you get the refillable 60ml bottle but you also get not 1 but 2 60ml refill bottles. Great value a must purchase you do not want to miss out on, buy now I recommend you buy this Alien set. You also get a chance to choose 3 samples which is added to your order and at the moment delivery is free of charge.

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum & Eco Refill Set
column7:
my wife loves Alien so buying this gift set is perfect? She has plenty of Alien
to keep her smelling great till summer gets here!

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum Basic Set
column7: Variety of products,value for money. Quick delivery.

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum Basic Set
Alien Eau de Parfum Basic Set
column7: I have worn Alien for years and wanted a perfume and moisturiser set to take on holiday and this was perfect, Just the right size perfume and cream and the little atomiser was ideal to slip into my handbag for nights out. I am a total devotee of the Mugler scents and this little set was just what I wanted !

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: The refill was a good idea but the bottle neck was no good for pouring. Spilt more than i wanted too.

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7:
This is amazing! I am a huge fan of this perfume and since i cannot buy womanity anymore this is my favorite perfume. Having this as a refil you get more for your money and its really easy to use. It comes with a funnel so you dont spill and you still have some left over whcih you can ue later. 

I get no end of compliemts on this purfume and i highly reccomend.

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7:
I love Alien perfume, and prefer using the eau de parfum rather than eau de toilette as the fragrance lingers all day. I found that the stronger eau de parfum eventually dissolved the 'stone' bottle's spray mechanism and gold top, so I now display the bottle, whilst keeping my refill bottle safely in the dark - maintaining it's amazingly evocotive smell, whilst still allowing me to dab on my favourite perfume when needed.
I've also found that by buying direct from mugler.co.uk I ensure I am getting the genuine article, plus lots of bonus samples and gifts by being part of the circle! Thanks Thierry Mugler.

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: Fabulous perfume which lasts all day. So many compliments when out and about. I feel like a film star as so many people ask what perfume I’m wearing. I can still smell it at the end of the day. Love love it . Well done Thierry mugler you have cracked it.

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: The perfume was great value direct from manufacturer, delivery was prompt even at a very busy time of year. My better half only uses this perfume and this offers great value.

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: Brought as a Christmas gift in Black Friday Sales. Amazing prize with extras. Quick delivery. Great service. Well recommend!

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: Item arrived in excellent condition and prompt delivery on the expected date.

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: Great customer service, fast delivery What more can I say,my wife is very happy

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7:
Great as ever. I only wear this perfume. I love it and getting it direct from Mugler is the only way to buy it. Great price, easy ordering and freebies and swift delivery.
I have often been asked what perfume I’m wearing, it always get favourable comments. 
Thank you Mugler

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: Smell of luxuries, amazing as always, me and my husband just loving it

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: Delivery was super fast as this ended up being a birthday present from my son at very short notice. My wife loves it and it's only second to ANGEL and the price for the refill is great value.

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: This is a perfect way to refill your bottle of perfume

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum Seducing Offer
column7:
What excellent service right from choosing product to receiving it

I am a huge fan of Alien, it's so gorgeous and it stays on me a long time. I always get compliments when I wear it. It's not too overpowering, for me it's my perfect scent.

column6: Distinctive Alien with great customer service
column7:
This was purchased as a gift for my wife's birthday. There is not much one can say about Alien, it is a classic and just about the only scent I can recognize and name when worn by others. 

It is nice to have the confidence of the purchase being genuine product and there are some lovely touches the brand do to look after direct customers. 

Delivery was really quick and safely packed as well. 

Thanks guys.
Bought as a present for Xmas and had name engraved on bottle. This is an excellent touch and went down very well. Would definitely recommend.

This fragrance is my favorite atm. The smell of jasmine is incredible and tint of white amber and cashmeran wood. Absolutely unique and celestial. Makes me feel good wearing it and boasted my inner confidence. Not to mention the beautifully crafted bottle that fits nicely to the hands and looks like a germ stone clasped by golden claws. I highly recommend.

Perfume was too strong for me 
Too much like the original Alien
I bought this parfum a month ago and its absolutly fantastic and refreshing
The smell is wonderful it was a gift from my husband for our 40th wedding anniversary

The original Alien doesn't suit my skin, although it smells amazing on everyone else. Alien Extraordinaire is like summer in a bottle. Smells like luxurious honey but without the sickly sweet overtones! Heaven in a bottle! ♡
Very 'pretty' daytime version of my favourite scent. It is very similar (but different) to both the Alien Eau de parfum and Eau de toilette. An instant favourite.

column6: At last a perfume I like!
column7: I tend to be sensitive to strong odours & a lot of perfumes I have tried just end up giving me headache or make me feel ill. Came across this when my young daughter tested it & exclaimed it would suit me. Really love this: just get a waft every now & then. I can’t help sniffing myself now!

column6: Nice and light perfume but didn't last long on me
column7: This is a light and sweet smelling perfume and was very nice when first sprayed. Unfortunately it didn't last very long on me. I LOVE Angel and Alien in the EDP. I think I need the perfume as opposed to the toilette sprays as they suit me better.
The scent is long lasting and very refreshing. There is a certain crisp of flowers and leaves to it. I love it.

Wonderful fragrance bought on holiday last year, I'm afraid this is the only one I really like, I find some of the fragrances too potent for me. Fabulous and quick service. Would definitely recommend.
A very summer smell ,love it,just a silly me I’ve order same perfume,on my second order ,but the I exchange for another one,perfect customer service

Well,well,well...what a service. Fantastic,I love it. Delivery time perfect,the box OMG no tape ,very easy to recycling,brilliant. Of course the perfum first class ,plus the free samples wow. From now on Am gonna buy only on this web. Because I bought at House of Fraser Aura by Thierry Mugler,the big bottle and didn’t get any free sample at all ,what a shame. From now on ,you got a loyal customer and I ‘m a very big fan of perfumes

This is my first purchase through Mugler.co.uk & it hasn't dissapointed. Gorgeous fragrance, which has had endless great compliments whilst I've been wearing it. The beautiful fusions catch you throughout the day & I will be buying more of the wonderful Mugler range as soon as possible.

column6: Fresh and feminine with an edge
column7: I was given this as a present and I was a bit sceptical on opening as I had expected it to be something too sweet like Angel. This was a wonderful surprise as it is fresh without being too light. I love wearing this and will replenish again soon which is unusual for me, I only have a few perfumes I can do this with as some I get tired of as being too sickly. LOVE this and I am hard to please. Other perfumes I love are Narcisco Rodriguez and Stella so if you like these others, you may like this too.
Love the smell make me feel so good and enjoy the whole day with few drops
Perfect anyone wanting this I suggest putting it on you Christmas list

Having worn the original Alien perfume for over a year, I thought I'd try Alien Eau Extraordinaire for a change and I am so glad that I did.
It is quite lighter that the original Alien but still as gorgeous, i am happy to add it to my MUGLER collection.

column20: Perfume > Women's Perfume > Alien Perfume > Fragrances

column7: This perfume is a beautiful spin off from the original Alien perfume, you first smell the gorgeous alien scent but then you will soon after smell something very unique.. a subtle citrus note that is the perfect partner to alien. I use my original Alien perfume as an autumn/ winter / evening perfume... however this perfume is the total opposite which is great ! If you are looking for something fresh and unique a spring / summer perfume then I highly recommend this gorgeous scent. I collect perfumes and this has to be my top perfume so far as I have never smelt anything so different, not only that but it lasts a good amount of time especially for a EDT perfume. The Silage isnt fantastic but if like me you like subtle and not overpowering perfumes then this is perfect for you, it isnt as strong as the original perfume but performance is on par. If you love Alien then I definitely recommend giving this scent a try!
column20: Perfume > Women's Perfume > Alien Perfume > Fragrances

column7:
I read the reviews online and after years of purchasing Alien purple perfume, I wanted to try something similar to it, but also different. Personally for me Alien essence Absolue is not for everyday use perfume. This perfume is great but it's little bit too sweet for me. 
Be extra gentle when opening bottle for refill. 
When I tried to open bottle to see how to refill it (yes, I'm curious) unfortunately I broke yellow plastic that's in front of the bottle. 
That never happened with other Alien bottles. 
Probably it was made from different durability plastic. It doesn't bothers me because it's only visual defect. 
Overall I'm happy with this purchase but definitely will be purchasing purple Alien perfume as it still remains my favourite.

I’m not a fan of sweet, sickly perfumes, which is why I love so many Mugler fragrances! If you enjoy wearing Alien original, give this a try.
I smelt it at a local perfume store and loved it so had to buy it off the site. I'm in love with the smell.

long lasting fragrance that received many compliments from friends and family.
I absolutely love this new perfume from TM . Once again they have produced a good quality perfume that all Alien lovers need to add to their fragrance wardrobe. This perfume will appeal to all age ranges and is perfect as day to day wear as well as wearing it on special occasions. The blend of spice and floral is exquisite.

I received a sample of this in the post and couldn't wait ti try it as I had heard a couple of friends say how good it was. They weren't wrong. The fragrance was strong and spicy and lasted for ages which meant I didn't have to keep renewing it throughout the day. I had a few people comment how nice it was which is always a good sign. I shall definitely be buying some of my own.

Recieved a sample of which I took on my hols ,, this is a beautiful intense smell which lasted through out the night and into the early hours ,,, it was well complimented through out the evenings I wore this ,, this has gone on my valentines wish list

I've not told either of my two daughters that I have it and have hidden the body lotion and shower gel as I am having a wet room put into my house at the moment and will be christening it by using the lotion and gel.......I cannot wait!!

I would defiantly recommend for a gift or even a little treat for yourself!

column6: Full marks to Mugler for doing refills

It's always nice to feel like a valued customer!

column7:
Love ALIEN perfume, but for £40.00 minus a penny, This candle does not smell very strong, looks nice but overall not worth the money. Feel I have wasted £40.00 To be fair it does smell a bit but not very much. Was looking forward to a nice fragrant Alien smell in the room.

Overall too weak.
Nice product, really good fragrance and fast delivery. Gift that was really well received

My daughter wears "Alien" perfume daily, she loves it. To make a change for her birthday purchased the candle, seems very nice but was not impressed with the cost, thought it was expensive. Appreciated the 3 free samples, thankyou.
Although the candle smells lovely when you smell it unlit, it is not as fragrant when lit which was disappointing especially for the price paid.

column6: Smells great amd the scent lingers for a while

Got some Alien mini's which a nice suprise, great for the handbag. Thanks Thierry Mugler
received this candle for a xmas present. beautiful smell just like the perfume, but a bit overpriced I think.
Love this purfume, the smell last for hours, I always get other people commenting and asking what it is

Not only does this perfume smell nice but last a long time. I only use 4 to 5 puffs and it last me the whole day. I wore one of the dresses I used it on a week later and a friend still asked what perfume am I wearing. Even when it drys down to the base note, it does still smell fresh. column7: I bought this the other day as well as my usual Angel EDP.  I was not sorry!  For Angel lovers this is a beautiful fragrance which is fruitier than the original.  It really does make you feel like you are away on holiday and this is the one I will be taking to Barbados with me!  I hope they continue it as it is a Limited Edition at mo.  Highly recommended ❤️

column5: Angel Eau Croisière Eau de Toilette
