column5: Angel Eau Croisière Eau de Toilette
column7: The experience starts with a bottle which if you are used to Angel, will be familiar, however it is marvellously differentiated through colour.  The perfume itself is for the great summer - light, refreshing and very different to other Mugler scents.  I highly recommend this one

column5: Angel Eau Croisière Eau de Toilette
column7: Having been an Angel fan for years, I thought I would have a change. Definitely it is not as special as Angel.  No-one has even mentioned the fragrance on me so it certainly hasn’t had the attention of Angel.
Beautiful perfume & bottle. I’d never bought Angel before I love it!!
I bought this product as a gift for my wonderful neighbour and she loved it. I use it myself and always get complements even from strangers.
Love it, love the smell love the deals.. buying direct is the best, fast quick and easy to shop.

I have used Angel for many years and love it when perhaps i board a plane and the air hostess says" i just love your perfurme Madame"   It has happened so many times and gives me great confidence throughout the flight.  Even recognised in the first class lounges. Many many thanks
I really love this fragrance. It is my "need a confidence boost" type fragrance and it never fails me. I am always asked about the fragrance when wearing it.
This is my favourite perfume of all time and everyone comments on how nice I smell!!

This is the only perfume I wear, as following chemo and changes to my skin chemistry everything else smells like drain cleaner. 
I can still wear Angel's kissing cousins, The Flower Garden Stars. 
Sadly they are almost impossible to get. Lily is my all time favorite followed by Rose then Peony. I live in hope of them making a reappearance. Meanwhile I am loving my Angels in all her guises. The body oil is superb, doesn't leave a sticky residue, nothing but soft perfumed skin.
All I get when wearing Angel is mmmmm you smell gorgeous, and what is that lovely smell. I'm never without Angel perfume as I feel undressed without her.

I have used Angel for a long time now and really love the perfume. I always receive compliments and asked what perfume I'm wearing.
I love the body lotion but the body oil is even better. The perfume stays with you fora long time during day or night. I would certainly recommend this perfume.

I have been using this perfume for more than 15 years, I love the smell, it lasts all day long and everyone compliments me when they smell it, they love it also.
I have had the same the refillable bottle for the same amount of time, great value.
I would highly recommend it.
Lovely perfume, best i have ever worn. Always get complimented when i have it on.
I have been using angel for about 6 months and love it. I tend to wear it in the day and then angel muse for night! Both fragrances are rich and smell beautiful. I have had many compliments on them.

My initial impression of the fragrance was that it was very strong!! It was overwhelming but after I spread it out and a couple of minutes passed it smelled wonderful! The scent is amazing but there is a musky after scent which overpowers the vanilla at times. I would definitely recommend it though because it stays on so well. I've been wearing it for 6hours now and have washed my wrists a couple of times (after toilet, when making food) but it's lasted and still smells really nice!! Multiple surprises!
This is a lovely fragrance, that lasts throughout the day. It makes me feel confident & I have had lots of compliments when I have worn it.
I've been looking for similar scent for ages, and I'm complete :) Long lasting and just brilliant!
wife more than pleased with product absolutely loves it

I have been wearing Angel for 20!years- everyone can 'smell' me coming! When I have left cardigans, jumpers, coats, jackets, etc people I work with have identified the garment because of my smell! I am so proud of this. I have tried other fragrances over this time ( including other Mugler ones! ) but Angel is for me...for life! ) I buy body lotion, body cream, shower products...everything that is 'my Angel' and mos t of my Christmas presents/ birthday presents are from Thierry Mugler,

Have worn Angel for many years and love it. People stop me in shops and ask what my perfume is and always say how nice it smells.
Sometimes I do buy another perfume but I always return to Angel.
It lasts all day and does not need topping up.
The service from Mugler is excellent and I would recommend this perfume and Mugler.
You have to try it to see what it is like.
I've known one or two people who wear it and it seems to suit them as well as me.
This is my favourite fragrance in the Mugler range, for me any how and I give it a 5 star
A beautiful fragrance to wear lots of complimentswill buy this again
My sister in law would not be with out this she just loves it

Angel is in a class of its own. immediately recognised and is one of those perfumes that stay with you for hours. Only a little spray is enough so the bottle lasts longer, and the bottle fits in your hand perfectly so no awkward spraying, I believe in Angel do you.
Sweet light scent. I like it a lot for my everyday routine look.

I have used Angel star for more than 20yrs. I love been identified with this. However I m very disappointed with my recent buy. The scent has been 60% reduced. Not as strong as it used to be. This is very unfair as one pays a lot for this product.
Will be asking for this for a birthday present so worth the money

column6: Angel the best product in the range
column7: My better half loves it and a great gift with a refillable bottle

Angel Star is my most favourite perfume of all time. 
The smell lingers for hours (normally) and always elicits compliments from lots of people.
However, I have recently purchased a bottle online (from AllBeauty.com) and although it is an authentic product and arrived boxed securely and wrapped in cellophane, the perfume's aroma lasts only moments before it disappears. 
I am SO incredibly disappointed.
I can only assume that it is old stock ~ if so, then surely sellers need to state this? Perfume is called "perfume" for a reason! 
A statement of relevant date limits on the packaging would be helpful to the purchaser too.
such a beautiful fragrance, however as the sachet didnt contain any liquid i am unable to share my opinion on how it wears eg: skin sensitivity and aroma time length.

This perfume smells absolutely amazing!
If I could smell Angels, I imagine that they would smell like this!!!!

I wore this on Thursday 23rd March 2017 to a concert. It was only a sample. It has a fresh smell but my mum didn't like it as she thought it smelt of burnt sugar. It is presented attractively and it is distinctive. But it does not please everyone
Another beautiful release from Mugler, a fragrance which will no doubt become a classic. Light and fresh but with subtle depths it is ideal for wearing on any occasion.One to love
Uplifting,long lasting and memorable. This is a special unique fragrance once tries always to be on the"must have" list.

This is a lovely summer perfume. It has a great fresh and floral smell that is loved by me and my daughters, who just can't stop borrowing it. A perfume for the young and young at heart. Long lasting perfume as well.
lovely smell for everyday and evening. I cannot afford a bottle at the moment but I'm all ways hopeful. it was heavenly scent.
I love this fragrance it smells gorgeous. It is a sweet, light fragrance that lasts all day.
Yes another star is born to brighten up our nights and days..great product
you chose the right name for this perfume because its heavenly,there is nothing to touch this, my favourite of all times,thank you.

This is one my favourites. It smells amazing and lasts well.

It has a light sweet fruity oriental vanilla fragrance ideal for wearing during the day. Definitely not overpowering in the slightest. I would recommend for ladies of all ages and well worth the try.
Angel is so sensual, warm and fresh , l love the fact that you can wear it day time or evening, and it smells so expensive. l am addicted to it. I Love It.p
The perfume is nice and attractive. Lasts whole day and doesn't changing during the day, which is often happens with others perfumes due to the specific of my skin.
amazing scent that stayed on my skin for ages and that's why I would defiantly buy it again, thank you for the sample xx
So impressed by the scent. I have ordered myself some Mugler Angel Star from Boots, which should be with me today. Nice for internet shopping
Completely different to what I'd usually go for as it's unusual but I really liked this and it lasted absolutely ages. My young almost teenage daughter especially liked it. Would definitely buy.
I just love angel a spray of this makes me feel wonderful. Love to smell anyone passing with angel on its the only perfume I don't get fed up with.

Love this fragrance. I found it light and soft whilst being powerful enough to be an all day scent that didnt wain.
Love it. Great smelling perfume and it stays on for most of the day.

Love it love it love it

I love the smell and received compliments when wearing it

Both the Eau de Perfume and the Body cream have the most beautiful smell that lasts all day or night. You will constantly have people asking you what perfume you are wearing because it is so lovely. It is not overpowering or too much, just a really delicious smell that people adore - I have worn it for a long time and I cannot find another perfume that comes close, so will be wearing it for many more years.
Until I tried didn't believe how versatile this fragrance could be anytime anywhere it just fit into my life it has already been on my wish list

column6: I Love how I smell wearing Angel,tried the sample
column7: Wearing Angel made me feel luxurious I had two women asking me what fragrance I had on and was happy to say ANGEL I Love its fragrance so much I had to go and buy it. The bottle shaped like a star makes it look so much more expensive. Congratulations on this beautiful perfume and its packaging X
The perfume is really well perfumed, and suits me wonderful.
Really love the scent of Angel and will be buying more in the future
Of all the perfumes I have tried there is nothing that touches Angel makes you feel sophisticated and good,nothing beats it.

Angel star has become my go to perfume a firm favourite and the fragrance last's right through the day. The packaging is stunning and the best part you can purchase mini's for your handbag so great for travelling. I cannot wait to try other fragrance's by Thierry Mugler.
Love this beautifully light romantic fragrance, timeless & ageless. A perfume for all seasons and any occasion uniquely presented in a blue and silver star.
From an early age my granddaughter has loved the smell she has asked for a beautiful star bottle for birthday

This EDP can be worn for business or pleasure. I did not need to respray at all during the day, and felt satisfied that it had lasting power until the evening, when I did respray as I believe it helped me feel relaxed and ready to socialise.

I adore how this smells on me, it makes me feel beautiful when wearing Angel Everyone comments on how beautiful I smell also gets me attention as walk by them when wearing Mulgler Angel,,. So big very big Thankyou to Mulgler Thierry perfume company 
 Regards
 Patricia xx

I tend to wear perfume according to my mood and also when I wish to remember a special occasion as scent can play a very big part in triggering those special memories. I wore Angel on my wedding day, the greatest day of my life, I felt amazing and Angel truely fitted the occasion, a mixture of glamour and sophistication, ideal for my big day. I wear Angel at least three timed a week and it always takes me back to "that special moment."

column6: Lovely perfume for day or evening wear.
column7: Light but still distinctive scent. Ideal for day or evening wear. A pure feminine fragrance to make you feel good about yourself
A beautiful perfume to go with all the rest of the Mugler products.Just so gorgeous
lovely smell lasts all day just a little top up needed for the evening.beautiful bottle .makes you feel feminine and sexy.
The sample its self was impressive i really liked it, as for the perfume gorgous smelt really nice and lasted for ages

From the moment this fragrance is set free, its evocative tones start your imagination working in overdrive. It's ultra feminine, light enough for daytime yet sensual enough for a romantic evening. This is a perfume for every woman, young, or not so young and it lasts for a long time. I didn't think it was possible but, the longer it's on, the better it gets. Just superb!

I love the warm floral feeling this perfume emits, beautiful fragrance with a sweet air of freshness not at all overpowering on the senses. A perfect wear for day but an absolute must for the evening to add an invisible sparkle to the 'moment'
I really like this perfume because it remains the smell on you fir hours.
I'm in love with the smell so much so I actually bought a bottle well my friend did for me from duty free wear everyday now
Excellent product. Long lasting aroma.one of my favourite.
One of my favourite perfumes, long lasting scent ,fresh and clean

I love angel i also have muse and alien love them all just need to smell the new obe out cant remember the name sure it will be as nice as all the others,i have all the body lotions to each perfume beautifull xx

This is my go to perfume for special days or nights out. Would love to wear it daily but for me, it is a little price prohibitive for that. When I win the lottery, I will have a cupboard full of Angel perfumes!! Highly recommended, I cannot see how anyone can not like this lovely perfume.
Perfect smell for going out or occasions..Love the fragrance...
I love this scent,its long lasting and doesnt seem to fade as quickly as most others.
Lovely perfume, number one on my Christmas List. Love the bottle as well.

This sample of Angel Perfume was (sneaked away by my daughter) she loved it so much she has abandoned all her other perfumes and is now the proud owner of a bottle of angel perfume, and she rates it 10 out of 10.
Absolutely gorgeous perfume a little goes a long way & it smells divine.
Thank you for my sample. Beautiful fragrance and will definitely purchase
A delightful sweet enveloping scent, grown up and luxurious.
Beautiful perfume. Long lasting and just smells gorgeous!
Liked it very much, have purchased a bottle and am enjoying using it

Never tried this range before so I thought id send of for the free sample. So glad I did. Its gorgeous. Smells divine and lasts for ages. Even my husband (who is normally smell blind!) liked it and asked me what it was. When I saw the packaging I thought it was one of those fragrances for a younger generation, I'm 51, but I was so wrong. This is a beautiful, long lasting, delicious fragrance and I would recommend it to be on anyone's Christmas wish list.
My sample arrived but nothing happened when I sprayed it was just air, there was nothing in it think I must have been sent a faulty sample
Love this fragrance, beautiful, comforting and lingers deliciously on both body and clothes. Cannot recommend this enough to everyone. Love the shape of the bottle. Simply gorgeous.
requested the sample for my wife who loved the fragrance
Angel is a divine fragrance that lasts and lasts I have used other Muglar fragrances but always come back to Angel
Sweet like chocolate amazing richness without the cloying heaviness of some other parfums 10 out of 10
I would recommend Angel anytime daywear or evening very pleasant smell
I cannot give a review because I have not received a sample
I have still not received my sample, but still keep getting emails to review it, I can't!!!, send it and I will, thanks.
Nice sent .Lasts for hours .My wife loves it wearing it and i love it
beautiful aroma, lasts well, would wear this for any occasion but particularly special ones

Unfortunatly I am still waiting for my free sample to arrive

I personally didn't like the scent and thought that it was very strong. It isn't the worst perfume scent, but isn't like any perfume that I would go for as I usually go for more florally scents. The reason why I gave it three stars is because I know someone who wears this perfume and loves it. It really comes down to personal taste.

Angel Star is a lighter perfume than I would normally use. I did like the fragrance but found that it was not as long lasting as some of the other perfumes I use.

Would I buy this perfume? I think that I would
Angel is the best perfume that I have smelt in a long time. IT will certainly get you noticed. It will become your signature!

Absolutely love this frangrence. Angel is spellbindingly beautiful
& is a frangrence which lasts & leaves an impression.

Received an sample of this perfume it has a lovely aroma I liked it so much I treated myself to a bottle of it and I get plenty of compliments when wearing it I have always been a big fan of any of the ranges in these perfumes.
amazingg lasts all day and just one of my faves and cant wait toll buy the whole range
Amazing, distinct and long lasting perfume. Makes you feel amazing and completes your outfit. My all time favourite fragrance.
After trying my sample of Angel Star I have since purchased another bottle which I am currently using. I really like it.
Loved it and I will probably purchase a bottle when on holiday in a few weeks at the airport!
I loved this perfume ! The smell is addictive ! Many compliments paid when I was wearing it love it
Very nice perfume!!!Strong smell !I would definitely recommend it

Didn't get sample.....5stars.
Would love a sample to once again enjoy the essence.

This perfume is heavenly. I loved the lightness and the sophistication of the fragrance. Its very different to my usual perfume and I felt happy when I was wearing it. I loved the mix of caramel and vanilla, so light and dreamy. I plan to buy a full size bottle very soon and can't wait to try the other products in the range.

I have been using Angel for several years and I still get asked regularly what scent that I'm wearing and by who it's made. It's sweet enough to attract attention but not sickly sweet like most other sweet scents due to Angel beautiful deep base notes.

column6: A touch of all the places you have been to
column7: I have been using Angel for over 25 years and often as I walk into a room people will ask what perfume I use as they enjoy the fragrance so much and I have to say so do I
a pleasant and refreshing fragrance - a really girly buy
This is a very strong heady fragrance which I think suits younger person but I would recommend anyone to try it as perfumes always smell different on others
I applied but never received a personal sample ! However recently sprayed a tester in store ...it smells diveine and very distinctive :)
Angel by Mugler is a very distinctive perfume and reminds me of vanilla and chocolate, two of my favourite things. It is definitely on my birthday and Xmas list.
the perfume is absolutely gorgeous the smell.......
I love the delicate fragrance of Angel, it's my favorite perfume. It's so light and uplifting and I love the feeling of being wrapped by a heavenly cloud.
I thoroughly loved the fragrance it was similar to Anaise Anaise and will buy it in the future at the right price
Not received, how can I possibly review. Who said I had received?
It's a warm scent which I find gorgeous. It's a joy to wear. I love it.
Very recognizable scent! Little bit strong for me but I liked it nevertheless, Unfortunately I don't think this is for me. It has an exotic flavour and smells expensive.
Absolutely beautiful fragrance!! Really worth a try, after the sample I have had it bought as a gift!!

Having just retired I thought this might be a bit young for me,, but the smell was amazing, and lasted alnght,, even my friends commented on it,, I would definitely recommend this,, have even bought myself a bottle,,

column6: Heavenly Scent with that touch of the orient.
column7: This sample arrived and straight away the aroma from it when we squeezed it. The scent is wonderful. My partner loved it , she is not one for wearing scents apart from her deodorant as she has never found the one she really liked , until now that is. The aroma that comes from it seems to gently go from one to another but the blending is perfect and soft. It makes you think of the orient with super soft touch and lasting comfort. As it was mothers day coming up my daughter thought she would get some for her mother as this was the first scent that she would wear and I decided that as this was special why not get the largest bottle so my daughter put half towards it and I the other it was about £80 all but a few pennies we was supposed to get a free sample with it but that did not materialise but what the we had her the largest bottle available and on mothers day she was over the moon what our daughter had got her, secretly I think she knows I helped her with the money but I am not telling her. My Mrs now smells absolutely gorgeous and its very erotic blend to be near. I recommend you try a sample before spending on a bottle because they are not cheap and the sample does smell identical to the bottle not like some makers where the sample is quite strong but when you get the main bottle its not the same strength . With Mugler you get the same in sample as in larger bottle.

i loved this perfume I usually wear a musk type perfume but I am won over by this and would buy and I have 

people when I was out and about would ask what I was wearing and straight away in chorus said angel 

it is a smell everyone knows and its not overpowering like some perfume only negative is the price a bit on the pricey side 

would recommend this product
I love the beautiful intoxicating scent that makes you feel like you can take on the world. This fragrance turns heads and lasts all day

I LOVE patchouli and vanilla in fragrances and this is no exception. I was so pleased to receive the sample, I don't like spraying a perfume just once before I buy it I like to try it a couple of times. Like most Mugler fragrances it does smell expensive and lasts really well on the skin but I didn't find it overpowering at all. It is gorgeous. I have an aunt who collects beautiful perfume bottles and I have had to promise the bottle to her.
I gave this to my daughter (age 26 ) to try also.it suited her far better than myself.we felt it was definitely for a younger person.

It's a great fragrance which is versatile. You can either wear it at day or night, dress it up or dress it down. It's absolutely divine. Not too strong that you can get a headache and not too light that you can't even tell once you spray it. Lasts quite long. Very pretty packaging, in a bottle which looks like a star and looks nice just placing it on the dressing table. Highly recommend it!
A Beautiful smell which lasted all day! Received many compliments from people asking me what fragrance I was wearing.
Lovely perfume, always get compliments when wearing it.
Love soft fragrance that last all day without having to reaply
beautiful soft sensual flowery fragrance, The soft tones wer not overpowering and gave a lovely soft fragrance.
I liked the fragrance it wasn't heavy and the fragrance stayed on the skin several hours later. Im glad I tried it and would use this during the day
I love Angel an Alien favourite perfume need to try Muse now .
Must have addition to your perfume collections. Wear it and be an Angel.
love this perfume , it is my all time favourite look forward to birthdays and special occasions as my husband always remembers this perfume.
This has a beautiful calming smell. Not too over powering but subtle and very seductive!
Well received the sample was looking forward to trying it, but before I could even try my granddaughter pinched it , she said smelled lovely and have to admit it did smell nice on her.
I haven't received any samples yet can u send me sum please and alien perfume thanx
i think this has to be the best i have tried, just delightful
I find angel a beautiful, very feminine perfume, not over powering like some perfumes, just right.

I love the smell of Angel . It is fresh without being over powering and I could still smell a light aroma after my night out . I have paid a lot more for perfume but never again . I am attracted by Mugler fragrances as they all are different and don't have that generic similarity that I have noticed with many other perfumes I have tried.
Sweet and sexy fragrance that lasts well - great for day or evening.

Been an angle wearer for years- longer than I can remember.
The angel fragrances never fail to amaze with the depth of fragrance and how they last.
I always have people asking me hours later "is that angel" and they are surprised with how well the scent has lasted over the day or night out .

It is one of the most iconic fragrances I've ever had the pleasure of wearing and I can tell another angel wearer at 50 paces lol

Lovely fragrance you can use it in the day or evening.one of my best three fragrances.
I would recommend it to my friends and family or anyone else I know.

what a lovely scent Mugler has found for its first perfume light and floral and perfect for everyday wear or for that special occasion.
Every lady needs a bit of Angel star in their life
I love it. It makes me feel really feminine and seductive. Perfect for those special evenings with the one you love.
Love it put it on bothy Christmas and birthday lists.
Never received the item so can't leave review if u send another one il leave a review but can't on nothing I haven't tried
I love this Parfum, its light and refreshing and makes me feel special
Angel Star perfume has a lovely scent that fills the room. The bottle is also a lovely shape.
Such a beautiful and sensual scent. It has made it into my top 3 parfums just love it
This lovely fragrance with its sweet fruitiness and marshmallow foamy vanilla is heavenly and lasts forever. I wore it in Portugal where the orange/lemon ambience added just a hint of citrus.
The fragrance was good but the light smell but liked it and shared with my family members.thank you.
Like the fact that this perfume is suitable for day and night, also the fragrance remains all day with lots of lovely comments.
What a wonderful perfume. I love this fragrance. I had this free sample delivered to my door and I fell in love with this delightful perfume. Thank you.
Love this perfume, it is certainly my new favourite x
This is an amazing perfume, long wearing and seductive, I have had many people asking me what I am wearing.
Never received sample in first place to review. I have not been sent any samples at all. I have not been sent any samples at all.

Such an adorable smell with the patchouli and bergamot at the forefront its a warming attractive scent that I love to wear on a daily basis,so getting a freebie was a definite bonus.Thank you very much indeed.
Deserves it's name It's a high class fragrance With an adorable shape to match. Last all day and smells heavenly.
Love the fragrance. Not too heavy just right. Wore it to a bbq and a special occasion. Compliments from my female friends. Even my husband noticed the new scent and said it was lovely. Praise indeed!
This is my daughters favourite perfume. I buy her a bottle for her birthday every year.

I love this perfume so much its so fresh and sweet you always no when someone has been in a room wearing this perfume its beautiful thank you cordelia.
this perfume speaks for its self angel star.the smell lingers last longer than perfumes i used to use also its soft smelling not harsh.

This perfume is so beautiful really love it sure would buy it again

definitely different, would have liked a larger sample. like the look of the bottle.

love this to bits its a modern fresh fragrance and is not heavy.

column6: Mugler perfume is heavenly especially Angel
column7: I love all Mugler perfume they go on well and last for ages with the same scent, some perfumes change after they have been on a while by not Mugler. Everyone always asks me what perfume I'm wearing as the scent is heavenly. I particularly love Angel and Muse and would without a doubt recommend these to all my family and friends and they are both on my Christmas list.
Absolutely love this perfume it is like wearing the best silk clothing money can buy with an undertone of liquid chocolate buried under the floral tones heaven in a bottle x
did not receive my sample of Angel! However have smelt it on someone and it really is lovely hence my Excellent and would recommend ratings

The best fragrance in the world for my opinion.
I love it, elegant, sexy and sweet, perfect for day and night. The packaging is very stylish and easy to use. I recommend this parfume!
A perfect fragrance, and one that received many great comments. It makes you feel strong but feminine a deadly combination
I fell in love with this sent as soon as I sprayed it. I would definitely recommend it and I would wear it everyday.

Received a sample of this to try and fell in love! This fragrance is just yummy the fruit notes along with vanilla and caramel make it mouthwatering.

Must invest in the larger size although the sample size is fab for a small purse and the design of the packaging is so cute.

column6: Angel perfume tried and tested lovely
column7: Beautiful and so fresh I would be over the moon if some bought this for me as a gift don't think I can afford it oap but we'll worth every penny

Extremely pleasant and very fragrance, and a long lasting fragrance
Another star product ticking all the boxes excellent love it

I received a sample of Angel after applying online. Its lovely a nice strong and sweet smelling perfume that lasts well.
From its legendary shaped bottle (although I do recommend the stand) to the most wonderful scent Angel is a unique sensory experience like no other.Fabulous !!!

column6: The name Angel speaks for itself
column7:
I've been using Angel for 20yrs now, 
I get as many compliments now wearing it as I did from day one.
I even get stopped in shops , restaurant's where ever I am asking what I'm wearing. It's such a distinctive smell, even the lotions smell exactly the same.
I love Angel so much my daughter Carries the name, i give her a little spritz of Angel perfume in her hairctoo. I wear no other perfume, as there is nothing else like that delicious smell of Angel .
Really pleased with the scent. Lovely bottle though I wish it stood up so it doesn't take so much room on my shelf. Good company to buy from

Will always buy this just love its original smell.

column6: Good service but the fragrance fades fast
column7:
I was very happy with the fast, efficient service from the Mugler website. The perfume was a gift for my wife. 

However, we have noticed that the fragrance fades very swiftly after it has been applied, therefore I can't really recommend it to others.

I absolutely love this fragrance. I only buy this product from yourselves and its the only fragrance I wear at all times. The service you give is 100% and would have no hesitation in recommending yourselves.

this is an excellant product and getting the refillable bottle engraved was a lovely touch it made my day on valentines day,and to top it off the free samples will definetly order straight from muggler again rather than a 3rd party

column6: Engraved bottle is a real treat
column7:

Delivery was prompt.

Having FOC engraving on the refillable bottle is a fab. idea and looks lovely.

Then to add further insult I recieve emails requesting me to review products that I still haven't yet received.
Appalling!
My wife has had this fragrance before so it was an easy choice. She loves it.

column5: Angel Eau de Parfum & Eco Refill Set
column7:
This really is a bargain buy... 50ml refillable bottle and two 50ml eco refills of this fabulous, long lasting fragrance. I got a January discount but still great value at the full price. Swift delivery and well packaged.
It is a shame that admin wouldn't amend my chosen bonus items as requested immediately after purchase! 'Unfortunately we are unable to make any changes to an order once we have received it'. This is not the first time I have received curt responses from them.

column5: Angel Eau de Parfum Étoile des rêves
column6: Angel Eau De Parfum Etoile Des Reves 5 Star EDP
column7:
Hi everyone
I thought I would just let you know my opinion of this lovely perfume. I purchased this on sale for £66 which I thought at this price it was worth a try. I have not been disappointed.I absolutely love love love this. I have been a wearer of Angel EDP for around 12 years now & it is my all time favourite. Well I should say it used to be! My number 1 is now Angel Eau De Parfum Etoile Des Reves. On me I find it slightly stronger & lasts longer. I do not know much about ingredients of any perfumes but I do feel after a while I can smell Chocolate which is just devine. if you have been thinking of trying this I highly recomend you do, especially while it is still on sale. I personally hope it stays around for some time. Also must mention the great service from both telephone conversations to being kept informed right the way through the delivery process. Thank you ever so much, I will be back!!!!!!

column5: Angel Eau de Parfum Étoile des rêves
column7:
I bought this as a treat for myself and luckily, I found someone who had a sample of this version of Angel and although there are many ways in which it's noticeable that it's Angel, to me, there were enough differences to the normal Angel for me, the sample made the decision to buy this a lot easier.
However, there are a couple of complaints; one is the price, it's a lot of money for 100mls, and the other is the design: not of the bottle itself but the top. I had hoped that it would come with a lid, but I understand why it doesn't.

As for the fragrance itself, it's a more intense version of Angel and although I'm not a huge fan of Patchouli normally, it is dispersed and on me, it's more subtle. Personally, I would use this during the winter months or on a special occasion.

column5: Angel Eau de Parfum Étoile des rêves
column7: Love ordering from here , you always get freebies and discount ! Plus the service is very efficient letting you know what's happening with your order and where it is , plus you get a star for every pound you spend ending up with a £15 voucher when you have collected enough stars plus free delivery ! I'm on my second order , highly recommend this website , just ordered my husbands birthday prezzie !

column5: ANGEL Eau de Parfum Gift Set
column7: I bought this just before my holiday to the Arctic Circle and was really happy with the handy small bottle of my beloved Angel. Just tucked it in my backpack and off I went.

Parcel was delivered but absolutely no gift card. My sister was phoning round trying to find out who had sent it. Really, really spoiled my gift to her. Was also disappointed that no gift wrapping available. Would not order gifts again online.

column5: ANGEL Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7:
I love this scent and have been wearing it for 20 years. I love to layer it with body lotion and oil. Whenever I wear Angel I know when I enter a room I will receive comments on my scent...it NEVER fails. I hate to tell others what my scent is but I do.
The longevity of Angel (for me) is at least 12 hours (if I ayer). I would NEVER wear another perfume as my husband adores Angel and disallows me to wear anything else....

I am a perfume addict so have sampled everything out there...my last favorite was Chicane by Patou but this sadly has been discontinued.

As I live on a boat I have limited access to my perfume but have managed to buy some (at a reduced price) in San Andreas.

Also the fact that Ange offers refills is an added bonus. When I go to Canada/the UK (which is yearly) I stock up. my bottles are refilled, I get new oil and body lotion. Love the body wash also but in the extreme heat this sometimes goes 'Off'.

column5: ANGEL Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: Please bring back 50 ml refill bottle for angel perfume as some of us just can’t afford £90 at a time thanks

column5: ANGEL Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: I am very pleased with my purchase of Angel refill bottle ,it was easy to refill original Angel bottle. Would recommend to friends and family .

column5: ANGEL Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: I never write reviews but feel people should be aware ! .Really Poor Service ! The item did not smell like Eau de perfume . 3 weeks later still waiting for MY Refund ! . 5 emails and not one reply back .2 telephone calls then advised by staff the refund will be refunded . Now into another week still no refund . I can honestly say they are one of the worst companies I have ever dealt with ! Be Very Carefull ordering direct these companies are not always what they seem .

column49:
Dear Pamela,

Thank you for your post and please accept our sincere apologies for your disappointment with your recent order with Mugler.  As you would expect, customer service is an area that Mugler as a brand genuinely prides itself on with a dedicated in-house customer relations team on hand to provide personalised and tailored solutions to each and every request.  Therefore, we were most surprised and indeed concerned to hear that you are waiting for a reply and we are in the process of investigating this internally.   Our online team have confirmed that they are today speaking with you via email to resolve this matter and we thank you for taking the time to draw this to our attention.

It is now my knew signiture scent, it's absolutely beautiful. It is fairy dust in a bottle, sweet yet seductive, making me smile everytime I spray it. I even smell the bottle when I see it and would spray my whole life with it if I could. I panic bought as many bottles as I could last year for fear of it not coming out again, but its back! And I want it to stay forever!

column6: Products amazing customer services is a joke
column7: I cannot believe I've been asked to write a review when I never received my order! My mum loves Angel and I placed A £61 order with a time restricted voucher, waited weeks then got an email to say I was being refunded as the courier couldn't find me! I begged customer services this was an important order for my mum so please not cancel and re issue, customer services replied they cannot do that so I asked them to honour the voucher but they refused to do that either! So good luck but it's the last time I will buy again. Lucky mum likes other scents too.

My husband bought me Angel Set as a present in 2003. I loved the wonderful scent/spicy combination of the shower gel, body lotion and Angel Eau de Parfum. 

I love the prolong lasting effect,, no day passes without someone complementing me or asking for the name of the perfume.

For me, it is a unique relationship.

Angel is my all time favourite fragrance. When I haven't used it for a while & catch a whiff it always makes me smile. Love the warm exotic notes & if when it's layered a little lasts all day. This Gift set should have been a present for someone but I couldn't resist keeping it for myself. A true indulgence. Love it.

love it, love it, love it
one of my favourite perfumes

Purchased this from house of Fraser on Sunday the 15th of April as the lady at the counter sold it very well, unfortunately I’m really unhappy with my purchase, I have Angel,Alain and the new Aura which I have no complaints about these, a few spirts and you can smell them on me most of the day and get compliments about them, the Angel fruity fair it’s not the same, 6 squirts in the afternoon and in a few hours the smell has gone. Now at £48 a pop you would expect more the a few hours of wear. I’m such a fan of all the Mugler products but this is not one for me, just gutted I spent so much to be so disappointed.
Great product and the Toiletry Bag is excellent quality. Lovely gift for Birthdays etc.

I always buy this perfume as I feel it is my signature scent and people always ask me what perfume I wear as it's very distinctive.
Will always buy this especially when the prices of the gift sets are so competitive

I ware Angle e everyday so this I treated my self to this affordable luxury gift set. I was also able to try new perfumes that I would not normally go for, with opportunity to order free samples with this product
Absolutely love this fragrance. Well packed and timely delivery. :)
Angel is one of my favourite perfumes because it has a very sensational, attractive and seductive aroma. I would recommend it to others.
I have been wearing Angel for some 20 years now and have never found another perfume that compares to it. This gift box was extremely good value, I purchased it when it had 20% of.

I bought this lovely set for myself. Surprisingly it wasn't the cheapest on the market, but they gave some lovely freebies which more than made up for that! I was delighted with it. The freebies, miniatures, shower gel and lotion, are perfect for my holidays. No matter which perfume I wear I always class this one as my favourite. Love it. ❤️

I surprised my Angel with this gift set, she especially likes the body lotion.

The fragrances were presented brilliantly and shares centre stage when she gets ready for nights out.

Bought for xmas present for wife. Did put on order to be gift wrapped but turned up unwrapped in a box and the box was dented in the side. But as it was only a few days before xmas day i couldn't send it back and get a replacement in time. Shame as my wife loves the product but wasn't happy with a smashed in box. Stick to buying from a shop next time.
This is an excellent gift in a lovely presentation box.

Superb box of beautiful products, well packaged in a delightful presentation box. I was also offered a choice of free samples! All in all extremely good value when buying my all time favourite fragrance.
I love this perfume it gives me the feel good factor.I have had people come up to me and ask me what perfume I am wearing .Cant say more other than it is gorgeous.
Smells divine and I am always complimented, even by strangers, on the gorgeous smell.

Pebble bottle Looks lovely on the dressing table, comes in a pretty presentation & keepsake box too, the smaller size is great for packing for a holiday / break away. Good value as purchased in the sale.

I first tried Angel Muse whilst on holiday and I really didn't like it at all but something was telling me not to discount it, and I'm glad that I went back and tried it again. I've loved Angel and it's many variations for quite a few years now so I bought myself the 15ml bottle. It was such a hit that my daughter (after using most of my bottle!) asked for one for herself. 
I bought the Muse Addict set as a treat for myself and when comparing it to the other gift sets that were available, this one seemed to be better value for money.
It is now probably one of my favourites and hopefully this will be a permanent addition to the Mugler universe!

Lovely....
It starts out with some rasp that reminds me of miss Dior.
that settles then you've got Angel and you've got a skin scent sweetness.
It's loud but settles eventually.

I received a sample of Muse Addict in a previous order and absolutely loved it so decided to buy the gift set. The service from buying direct from Mugler is second to none and I have no hesitation in recommending them or this fragrance.

A huge Mugler fan and in love with the scent of Angel Muse. 
Unfortunately the 9ml travel bottle before I even got to use it leaked everywhere in my bag. This was a big shame as it was really handy being able to bring that small bottle.
column20: Perfume > Women's Perfume > ANGEL MUSE Perfume

column7: I bought this after trying a sample. After a long time I found a perfume that makes me really happy. Warm and fresh at the same time, perfect for any season
I am so in love witn Thierry Mugler Angel Muse! My absolute favourite fragrance

I have always loved Angel so I couldn't wait to try this...and the tag line "Hate to love" was actually spot on! I didn't like it at all but something about it had me wanting to go and try it again but I still didn't like it. I wondered if this would be one of the few Mugler perfumes that I didn't get on with? 
No, It wasn't.
I bought the Angel Muse Seducing box and I now think that it's one of the most 'me' perfumes that I've ever bought! I'm now tied between Angel and Angel Muse for my go-to scent. I've now got another Seducing and the Addict set, and I can't wait for a new lotion/shower gel/oil etc to be available!

I recently purchased this product in a Belfast store. The lovely assistant first sprayed the tester on my arm. Really lovely so I bought the bottle. I found to my disappointment that the tester sample stayed on for approximately 5 hours and the bottle I got only lasted about an hour, if that. Very very disappointed with this product

Chose Angel Muse as a tester with an order of Alien (which I LOVE) and as others have commented too, didn't like it at first puff but it really matured beautifully on your skin over an hour or so into a lovely scent with real depth. Light enough for day yet sophisticated enough for evening too and it really lasts- I think it is because its tones seem so multilayered that you still notice it on yourself even by the end of the day when applied in the morning. A real grower.

column6: Aroma perfection for any stage of life
column7: I am entranced by this perfume especially for daytime wear at any stage of life, be it as a young woman through to that wonderful time of maturity in life

A friend of mine is always talking about Angel and other Mugler fragrances and I finally gave in and bought one myself. It was well worth £64! I absolutely love Angel Muse. Its a nice sweet fragrance with a hint of hazelnut once it's warmed into your skin. It's now my go-to fragrance for every situation! Glad it's refillable!
I have been wearing Angel since 1992 and still love it. Recently when in John Lewis I tried a tester of Muse and fell in love. This is my new favourite- I absolutely adore it.

column6: Not too sweet, and not too sharp
column7: I really like this fragrance. The 1st day I tried it I did it alongside original Angel which I quite liked but not enough to commit to buying a bottle as I thought it was a bit.....heavy. But this was just perfect. Smells different every time I wear it and you can smell the little notes which make it what it is. I have a very sensitive sense of smell and almost everything smells too sweet on me. But Muse has just he right balance. Brilliant for adding a bit of warmth to the cold months. I think I love this one!!!
Beautiful smoky subtle perfume but the box it arrived in was at least 20 times too big and so not environmentally friendly. Also the packing material around it was polystyrene, so not good either.

I already have Angel (have since it was first introduced) and Mise, so was intrigued to get the latest addition to the range. It is a beautiful perfume, light, fruity and differentiated enough from other members of the family. The bottle is attractive - one slight complaint is that the base seems a bit wobbly - it doesn’t stand cleanly.

I recently tried this in a well-known department store whilst on holiday and at first spritz, I didn't really like it, so I stuck with my usual favourite fragrance, Angel but for some reason Angel Muse stuck with me, something told me not to easily dismiss it. After receiving another bottle of Angel for my birthday, I saw a limited edition Angel:Le Gout du Parfum, which also has a background hit of bitter cocoa powder and I then saw that Angel Muse also has a cocoa note too; so I had to come back here to buy the seducing offer of a 15ml Angel Muse and It's true what the tag line states: I love to hate it!
With this new frame of mind, I ordered a sample of Alien Parfum too, because that too, I didn't like at first spritz! We shall see.....!
Truly surprised by how well Muse is lasting. I love the way it smells and i truly recommend it!

I love this perfume so much, got it a while ago and still have some left. It's not too overpowering and lasts a long time. I love to wear it if I'm off out for the evening. I'm always asked what I'm wearing when I wear this. I also wear Alien & Angel....wouldn't be without my Thierry Mugler collection of perfumes and body creams!
Beautiful perfume! The smell lasts all day. Comes in a gorgeous bottle as well ❤️❤️❤️

column6: Love the smell of angel perfumes it is exceptional
column7: Bought angel muse for my wife's birthday it smells excellent even by normal mugler standards. My only concern is I bought the refillable bottle which arrived in a well sealed box with no damage yet the bottle top was in many peices and cannot be opened as if it was forced into the box broken and then box sealed. Still awaiting resolution from mugler Re rectification.

I have used Angel for 7 years and never liked anything else more until I got a free sample of Angel Muse and I love it.
I wear Angel for a week and then change to Angel Muse they compliment each other well I find.
I have used a lot of various perfumes before this trying to find my signature scent and never been successful until now, I don't think i'd be able to use another after this, worth every penny.

From the first time I tried this lovely fragrance I said to myself this definitely a must buy. I was on the Mugler website and I said gonna treat myself. Always get good compliments whenever I wear it. I like to wear Angel aswell. Although the Muse is subtle it's very long lasting. Anyone who is thinking about purchasing this fragrance you won't regret it!

I love this perfume, in fact I love all MUGLER perfumes and have quite a collection but this is definately my go too perfume.
Light enough not to be overpowering for day wear yet sensual and exotic nough to carry you through to evening.
A long lasting delightful perfume.

I have been asked to re-submit my review as obviously my previous review did not please the company. As in my last review the product is fine but the delivery is rubbish. What more can I say. I am still waiting for a response from the company regarding my complaint and despite asking to be taken off their mailing list I still receive emails encouraging me to buy their products. Once again a rubbish delivery system made sure despite reassurances on the phone that my xmas gift did not arrive on time. I hope this review is acceptable this time.
Beautiful perfume, lovely smell and would recommend. Excellent service

Sweet fragrance and long lasting ,just disappointed with the way I received my product after being ask did I want it delivered gift wrapped and with a message this did not happen also with only 2 of the samples I had selected

I made my purchase at a Christmas promotion evening and had the product delivered to my home I was offered 6 free samples and my fragrance gift wrapped ,when I received my parcel it was in an oversized box with reams and reams of paper stuffed in and only 2 sample .I email to express my disappointment which I felt was received with very little interest .I know I am just one tiny buyer in the massive MUGLER world

The reason for such a low rating is simple. The product was fine but the delivery was rubbish. An order placed on 16th Dec was delivered on 28th Dec That is 12 days for a simple delivery. I was assured during a phone call on 21st it would arrive for Xmas It obviously didn't. I don't see any a point in belonging to this so called wonderful community of perfume lovers of it takes that long to deliver the product. I suggest heading down you're local high street and shopping there. The usual stock company email in answer to my complaint didn't help either.

My wife has been struggling to find something new that she likes, so I brought her Muze and she loves it and so do I the fruit and berry aroma give it a real freshness that you cant really put your finger on but know it is right.
Since purchasing this perfume, after receiving a free sample at Debenhams recently, I have received so many compliments and several of my friends have now bought the perfume. Well done, its gorgeous.

What an absolute surprise of a fragrance, on first contact I get the sweet grapefruit and a hint of Angel hiding in the background. (I fell in love with Angel in 1992 and has stayed my loyal companion since)

The sweetness diffuses to release a nutty cream with the dry down of Vetiver remaining strong with a subtle hint still of grapefruit.

What an amazing scent and awesome bottle! It is truly like Angels sister wants to play.

Fantastic add campaign #HateToLove.
column36:
06/13/2016 09:43 (thierrymugler-en_gb) Approved by client
06/13/2016 09:43 (thierrymugler-en_gb) Approved by client

column7: This fragrance is stunning and if you don't own it you are not a true Mugler fan. One spray and you are transformed to being a confident powerful woman. Hazelnut/Cream Cocoa notes are delicious!
I think Angel Muse is possibly the nicest fragrance I have tried.

As a lover of Angel I bought this and I love the fragrance but disappointed to find it's another bottle that won't stand up. Lying down it takes up too much space so I have had to stand it in a glass, this spoils the appearance of a lovely bottle. Please make them to stand up.
Beutiful presentation and perfume is light yet very distinct biught as a present for partner who loves Aura too

I am a big fan of Angel & Innocence, I saw this & thought I would try something new, it is very different for the muse eau de perfum which is for those of us who like a more richer fragrance, this one is very light & fruity & fresh , a nice summer fragrance, with that unmistakable mugler scent, I will be definetely adding this to my mugler fragrance collection

I bought this perfume for my friend,her 40th birthday. She really love the smell,also the guests from the party ,they like a lot . Thank you very much,definitely I’ll back to this website,the best on the market

I've been wanting to try this ever since I found out about it, but because I can't get to any department store or perfume shop, I have been hoping that this site would have this as a sample, to no avail. So, I have had to blind buy this but I haven't been disappointed.
Against the EDP I found that this one is much softer whereas the hazelnut cream in the EDP is far more noticeable than the EDT, but I couldn't detect the mandarin or the passion fruit at all.
Personally, I think that this EDT would suit me more during the summer because it's not as heavy. I'm very glad I blind bought this.
As i am a massive Angel girl, i was really please to discover this different take on my all time favourite. It has the traditional character of angel but with an earthy twist. And i love it!!

Angel has been our favourite for years, and although Mugler produces other wonderful smells, the Angel smell stays our favourite. 
Now with Valentine's Day, this Gift set was a Godsend, two pongs in a wonderful box, a really great gift. And she loved it. 
And myself, well I use Amen.
I love this perfume it smells Devine would recommend people have asked what I’m wearing

I must say what a terrible disappointment to find that Womanity has being withdrawn from your fragrance list. A true favourite as I am sure others will agree. Although it was discontinued some time ago and this is meant to be a review of Angel muse I felt this would be an ideal opportunity to air my views as I am sure there will be many more people who share my disappointment. 

Regards,

Janet Sharpe

column6: Sadly it gives me a really bad headache!
column7: Having wore Angel for years and years with no problem at all, sadly this Muse gives me a bad headache each time I have wore it! Waste of my money for me!
Great gift set discount made it even better thanks and it smells besutiful
Well presented in nice gift box, Angel Muse is another beautiful perfume by Thierry Mugler, I adore their perfumes. Pure Class.

Ordered this for a family member but it got cancelled a few days before Christmas. Luckily working in central London mean't I could grab the perfume on it's own elsewhere and family member was happy.
Service from Thierry Mugler direct... Shockingly bad! No reason given for cancelling my order or anything. Won't be using again.
I love this perfume. i wish there was a body lotion
I got a sample with my order and my fifteen year old daughter tried it and loved it. I have got her a bottle for christmas. Just the rught age to have a signiture fragrance for feeling good.
I love this perfume very much. I am officially addicted. Great service too.
column20: Perfume > Women's Perfume > ANGEL MUSE Perfume > Fragrances

column7: Excellent.The best ever. I will happily recommending this parfum to everyone. At work and every where I go people are saying that" we all know you are in, your parfum is everywhere". I love it.
column20: Perfume > Women's Perfume > ANGEL MUSE Perfume > Fragrances

column7: Gorgeous perfume. Lasts all day or night. I always receive compliments about my perfume whenever I wear it & the other ones. Definitely recommend
Love Angel Muse and love this little gem ,i can take it with me where ever i go

column6: Wonderful addition to the Mugler universe
column7:
Could there be a rival for the long-loved and gorgeous Angel? It would certainly seem so. Handily sized to pop into my handbag (or my daughter's pocket!). I'm looking forward to trying the Eau de Toilette soon; but I'm hoping that one day soon, there will be additions to the Angel Muse range, like the lotions, hair mist etc, so I can enjoy a pampering session. 
Extremely happy with this purchase and I'll probably be buying Angel Muse again and again...with a separate one for my daughter!
I love this fragrance, it's very long lasting and enjoying the free samples too,
Angel is my ultimate favourite perfume, I tried this and I love it too. Recommended to all Angel lovers

A clean soft perfume fruity yet soft earthy undertones
Last all day and received a lot of compliments 
Will be buying again

I brought this to try as i love the Alien perfume.
It smells nothing like i thought it would, nothing like Alien.
makes a nice change.
glad i tried it.
is quite a woody, sort of smell.
happy with purchase.
Never disappointed with any product, excellent service

I ordered this perfume for myself it is a lovely perfume and when wearing it I have had lots of compliments and people asking what perfume I am wearing it has great staying power and the size of bottle is very hand for popping in your handbag I use it for day use or for an evening out I would highly recommend it.

I have never bothered ordering perfume on line. But having missed grabbing a bottle on my last run through customs earlier this year I chose to buy this variant of Angel. 

I will be ordering online again at sometime, easy to navigate and use. So easy, especially with the samples, just a shame you cannot order a paid box of all their samples. Sometimes it would make selecting one as a gift easier.
the perfect size for my handbag......love the scent

I have always been an Alien woman as I think the smell is divine & people always comment when I wear it.

Well Angel Muse is its rival. Love the handbag size bottle, recommend to anyone. The fragrance is comforting yet seductive

If you have never tried the other fragrances don't delay, the testers don't do them justice, I have even sent of for Aura now

Love the shape of this bottle always buy Angel as I just love this gorgeous perfume this bottle stands up and looks amazing smells amazing I also got a free gift with this bottle and free samples amazing product I will be replacing once I have used.
I’m in my 25th year of using Angel and still get nice comments from other people ( men also ) how nice I smell. The new bottle shape is fantastic
A definite must have, beautiful scent, beautiful bottle, love it !!

column6: Angel New Star 75ml EDP: A triumph!
column7:
I have long been wanting this type of Angel Star because of its absolutely stunning design and at long last, I was able to buy it today. It is as beautiful as it looks on this website, if not more so! 
But as I bought it from elsewhere, I was slightly concerned about the scent being true, and after returning home, I was relieved that it is unmistakably Angel EDP... and that the code worked, because I've had others (including some of the flankers) that weren't recognised and as such, I've missed out. 

The New Star design is an absolute work of Art, and I'm thrilled with it!
I never got it and still waiting for answer from you!
waited on this for a christmas present and it nearly got to my house and then it suddenly turned around and went back to brussells, terrible company that do not care about their customers at all.
My favourite perfume the body cream is absolutely stunning I feel sexy and smell amazing

I bought this after receiving a travel sized tube with another purchase. Much bigger pot than I was expecting, looks very impressive on my dressing table.   The product itself is rich and luxurious, and a little goes a long way. The  perfume lasts for hours on my skin and I love it, and get loads of compliments.
My only complaint is regarding the little plastic spatula that comes in the box - unnecessary plastic, could have used wood. Or fingers...
Fabulous fragrance soft & creamy to apply.. Great Jar!

This is a beautiful, rich body cream. A little amount goes a long way so it lasts for ages. The fragrance lasts all day & lots of people commented on how lowely I smelt! Will definitely buy this again.
First puchase of body cream it is excellent so creamy and the smell is georeous
Can you tell me why it is so difficult to buy this product in retail premises. Have been trying to get it for months now. Please put it into shops and Airports . Thank you

This body cream is fluffy heaven .. it’s so soft creamy just perfectly yummy. 
ANGEL and ALIEN are my NO1 fragrances I love strong lasting fragrances and they both delivery on this and every product they come in . The packaging and the bottles they come in are so beautiful I love having them on display in my bathroom . Thankyou for such amazing fragrances . Fast well packed delivery ..
I love this body cream, especially after a bath. It makes your skill feel nice and soft and the bonus is the great smell of Angel.
I have been wearing my Angel since it's exception love it so much! I have my shower gel, body creme and original perfume since day one! Love it love it!!!

This is the second time I have bought this product, and am enjoying using it now as much as when I first tried it. The perfume is, how can I explain..........delicious!! Product arrived when promised, well packaged, with all the free sample size I was promised. Thank you.
Just love this product - glides onto the skin and provides a heavenly scent all day
I love wearing Angel, the body cream smells wonderful, its lovely and thick and leaves the skin soft and the jar is a beautiful star . Will be buying again

column6: One of the things I cannot live without
column7: I have been using this for over 15 years now and cannot live without it. It is a fantastically moisturising cream and the smell lasts forever, cutting down on the amount of perfume required throughout the evening
I purchased Angel body lotion as a birthday present for my friend, she was so pleased with the gift, it smells wonderful and compliments the perfume when worn together. Beautiful.
This is a product I am never without. The lotion applies really easily and leaves my skin smelling beautiful all day. Just this morning a colleague told me that I smelled lovely!

I've been buying this body lotion for a couple of years, and it used to come in a pump bottle which always frustrated me as I could never get the last drops out.  Happily, the new squeezy bottle will end that problem. 

The lotion moisturises without being too heavy.  As for the fragrance, I LOVE it! I get asked often what perfume I am wearing, which is also how I found out about it, by asking another wearer.  Just lovely.

Have sampled this many times and finally took the plunge!

Light and easily absorbed, the scent lasts for hours (a patchouli light version of Angel EDP).

Packaging fantastic - the star bottle looks fab next to the shower get in my bathroom!
Angel is my favourite perfume, as well as body lotion I use Angel shower gel, deodorant, hand cream, hair mist and perfume.
I love angel although I use both body lotion and perfume and I also use alien and have been using these perfumes for around 25 yrs
Have been using Angel body lotion for years and I absolutely adore this product.
A beautiful lotion, light, with along lasting fragrance.
I do like a bit of layerin. This cream is to die for. It actually nourishes your skin and leaves you feeling sensual . It smells Devine.
It’s fragrance lasts for hours. You only need to use a small amount so the lotion can last you months. Lovely product.

Just the kind of body lotion I needed. Feels good to put on and feel good when on. Nothing can beat the perfume of Angel which now can be on your whole body through this body lotion. Perfect for yourself and perfect to give as a gift.

My God, this is one of the best purchases I have ever made. I usually use Angel perfume by day but at the end of the day before I go to bed, I like to spray a little of the Angel Perfuming Body Oil as it feels so luxurious and comforting. I absolutely love it and a decent size. Quite magical!
This time I have purchased the Angel Body Oil and it smells delicious and during the day time it is all I need to wear and still smell beautiful......
This oil goes into skin easily and the scent lasts all day, no greasy feel and lovely soft skin. Would definitely recommend to everyone.
I apsolutely love the oil soray, it lasts all day plus u don't use as much as when ur using the perfume spray

I use this around summer holiday time, after sunbathing as a moisturiser and daily to keep my tan looking good. 
Lovely!
Smells gorgeous and leaves a lingering scent on your skin. The spray is easy to use.
Great idea, perfect size to keep in you handbag, and no need to worry about spills with it being a gel and brush. Hoping the Les exceptions will be included in this design next
I love this hair mist it has such a beautiful smell spray it on your hair and wait for all the compliments cos you will get them.
pleased with the hair mist, and the freebies, compliments my Angel perfume perfectly

I bought this after being told that spraying your hair with perfume ensures it stays on longer than on your arms. It works wonderfully. Also, when I purchased this on line, I got some free samples and free delivery which was very quick to arrive.
I mean at first didn’t think it smelt that bad but after the second use I couldn’t stand the smell anymore and gave it to my mum and she loves it. Deffo more for elderly!!
Absolute love this .... great prompt service and will buy again from you
Fantastic. I ordered this and received two free sachets of body cream and shower gel plus a small Angel parfum spray too. Lasts ages...compliments my Angel parfum beautifully.
I love this hair mist & always take one on holiday, just wish you did an Alien hair mist.

I bought this for my daughter and she absolutely loves it. Smells exactly like the perfume and lasts a long time, her hair is long so she loves to spray this after being shampooed. Very quick delivery and great communication, well packaged and sent with three perfume samples. Would definitely buy from Mugler online again before going to a shop. Will be buying for Christmas again and getting the perfume bottle engraved next time.

Cream is really nourishing and non greasy but the perfume in the cream is so strong I can't use it anywhere as it lingers and smells the whole room out - I can still smell it even after washing my hands several times several hours later. So not really fit for the purpose I bought it for (to use at work in winter when my hands get dry) So if you're going outside it's fine but don't use in the office or in your room!
If you like Angel you will love this hand cream. Soft and gentle on the skill with the great smell of Angel.

I'm an 'Angel' lover but the hand cream I have purchased for the first time.
Very easy to use tube, no messing about the lid.
Fantastic hand cream and very handy.

This is a fantastic way to moisturise your hands (and anywhere else - I have been using on face/neck too) and fragrance them with the wonderful scent that is Angel.

Looks and feels a premium product - excellent packaging and the tube has a twist and pop nozzle which is good to use.

Skin is instantly softened and smoothed without any greasy residue.

Thumbs up!!!

Ordered the hand cream on line came very quickly glad I sent for it as it is a lovely product and the three free samples I received are just right to take on holiday with me so an excellent product and service.
This hand cream is lovely. It leaves your hands feeling soft and the gorgeous scent stays with you for a long time.
Smells as strong as the perfume, no stickiness or left over residue will be buying again!
Absolutely love this product does what it says on the tin and also has that angel sent we all love

column6: My deodorant for the past 8 years
column7: I simply love this product. I started using it because of an allergy to some chemical present in the common and cheap deodorants found in supermarkets. My skin is quite sensitive and it gets irritated very easily. I tried this product on an attempt to find something that would suit my skin (after trying many) and I was so happy to learn how wonderful it is. It does not make my skin itchy or red or irritated. In addition, it has a delicate, glamorous and attractive fragrance.
I bought this roll on and must say this is best one I ever use .Its last for 24h defiantly .I am very very happy for all products from Mugler.
Outstanding and very strong smell of the Angel . How wonderful. The best web to order plus free bees ,well done . Highly recommend This web

Small and compact enough to have in my purse and take it everywhere with me. Nice little gift for myself from me to me. Smaller ball to roll on which is better than other larger roll on balls, and not to much liquid on application. 
Great product, would recommend
I now have the perfume, shower gel, body lotion, hair mist, hand cream and now roll on deodorant. Smelling gorgeous from top to toe!

This product is fabulous, could still smell the product at the end of the day.
Would highly recommend and will definitely be purchasing my Angel product again.
I bought this deodorant as I use the rest of the Angel range and thought why not try the deodorant. It rolls on really nicely, not at all sticky and the fragrance lasts all through the day.
I am using it for many years, always happy...does its job perfectly, plus soft wonderful smell.

A lovely product which I prefer to the spray. Effective and complements the perfume which I also use. Even when I don't use the perfume and use another, I always use the Angel roll-on. It's gentler than others, but perfectly effective.
This combines with the body cream keeps you smelling all day long. I love it
I always use Angel, it’s is so lovely and very soapy. Leaves your skin feeling super soft and very fragrant. Much prefer this new bottle design!

Such a wonderful idea. The bottle is so beautifully designed I get pleasure every time I use it. As I live on a boat I have limited access to my perfume but did manage to get a bottle of Angel refilled on San Andreas. I usually get my perfume refilled annually in the UK?Canada I visit both countries every year.
when I refill my perfume I also pick up Angel body lotion and oil. I love the perfumed shower gel but sadly this sometimes goes 'off' in the extreme heat.

I am a perfume addict so I have sampled just about every perfume out there and nothing comes close to Angel.

Just love Angel , the shower gel just make you feel fresh and luxious
I wear Angel every day have refillable bottles in every handbag. 
And every day someone comments on my perfume .

column6: Luxurious way to layer the scent of Angel
column7:
Have sampled this many times and finally took the plunge!

Lightly foaming and gentle on the skin, the scent lasts for hours (a patchouli light version of Angel EDP).

Packaging fantastic - the star bottle looks fab next to the body lotion in my bathroom!
I absolutely adore Angel perfume. Have had shower gel before the smell lasts for ages.

I love this product along with all the others so please HELP it’s been unavailable for weeks now and I’m squeezing the last from my bottle why is it so hard to get ? And how much longer will it be before it’s back in stock .

very pleased with the product and delivery, however I have so much hassle trying to reorder it, sometimes the site doesn't recognize login details, and then tells me it cant deliver to my address, despite delivering the product I am now reviewing, please sort it out Mugler, don't really want to go elsewhere

for a perfect shower enjoy the luxurious scent of angel
mixed with body lotion for a lasting scent

I really love the Angel shower gel as it feel like the most luxurious way to shower. It leaves a gentle perfume on your skin making you feel great. No wonder I love it my showers when it makes you feel this good.
Ever lady should try this shower gel, it will make them feel special

column6: Lovely product - bottle could do with improving
column7:
I love all Angel products. This is the fourth bottle of shower gel I've owned. The gel is lovely but the bottle is brittle and cracks if squeezed which I always end up doing because the product pours slowly. As I mentioned, it's the fourth bottle I've purchased so it's not deterred me from buying it. 
FYI...I love the perfume but the body cream is the absolute best if you're considering treating yourself!
A luxurious treat for when I need to feel special. You only need to use a small amount and the scent lasts on the skin. Nice for layering with the body oil and perfume.
Bought for Christmas. A removable lid / top would make the product excellent; to access gel remaining in the bottle / container.
I absolutely love the Angel deodorant and find it goes wonderfully well with the perfume, shower gel and body lotion
I love the fragrance it makes me feel special, great service and carefully packaged, luxury
This lovely deodorant smells just like the perfume and it lasts all day. I use it along with the body oil. It makes me feel fresh and confident.

I wouldn’t normally purchase the shower gel or hair mist however I purchased this in the sale and then used a further discount code so it is well worth the money - very pleased! Everyone comments how lovely I smell!!
column20: Perfume > Women's Perfume > Angel Perfume > Sets

column7:
Angel EDP is my signature and has been for years. I currently use the shower gel, lotion, hair mist and hand cream. The products layer so well you only need a light spritz of the perfume. 

The body cream is amazing but pricy so when I saw this beautiful set on offer, I could not resist! I basically paid for a regular 50ml star and the rest was FREE!

I also had a £15 reward and an additional £10 code.

I jumped so high for joy, I’m up there with the celestial angels right now!

Buy direct - the loyalty offers and bonus samples are fantastic!
column20: Perfume > Women's Perfume > Angel Perfume > Sets

column7:
This was a gift for a friend. Couldn’t of been more delighted when it arrived 
Also my friend was over the moon with contents and amazing packaging
column20: Perfume > Women's Perfume > Angel Perfume > Sets

column7: Bought the 100ml bottle as this was one of my favourite perfumes... Doesn't smell the same as what it used to... its nasty! I emailed the company several times and no one has got back to me whatsoever for a refund return or anything else. Terrible customer service, money out of pocket and a foul smelling perfume. Don't order this perfume from these people!
Cannot resist ordering an original bottle - refils are ok - but never seem to be as good as original bottles.... looks good too

My wife adores Angel after receiving a couple of samples with a bottle of Alien I bought her as a gift last Christmas. It's difficult s a bloke to describe but it smells very nice and fresh and she often gets asked what she's wearing .
I’m afraid I was extremely disappointed with this item. A collector of any new bottles in Angel. Not sure the price is justified.
column20: Perfume > Women's Perfume > Angel Perfume > Fragrances

column7: I'm afraid I was disappointed with this item and returned it . The perfume is amazing, no problem with that . I just thought the item was poor value for what it cost.

column7:
Simply great a must for any real angel fan 

Perfect Christmas present
