column7: These smell amazing, the fill the house with the aroma of angel.... love them
Absolutely gorgeous and true scented candle....so nice I don't want to light it!!!
Love these candles as they last such a long time and makes the whole room smell fantastic.

When you hold this in your hand it feels luxurious. The glass candle holder is beautifully designed. I bought this as a gift for my partner's mother and she fell in love with it. The Angel perfume is her favourite and she always said how nice it would be if she had the candle. It is a gorgeous gift and I would highly recommend this to anyone who loves candles and this fragrance. Although it seems a little pricey it is worth every penny. When lit the aroma fills the room within 10 minutes. You will not regret this purchase. It made a fantastic gift and is something I want for myself now! The complimentary samples that came with it was a huge bonus too as it added little extras with the main gift. Thank you for such a breathtakingly beautiful product Mugler. Please keep it up and expand your home fragrance line. I will keep a keen eye out for new products. It takes a lot to impress me and to get me to write a good review so I would highly recommend to any potential buyers - you will not be disappointed at all!

I received my first candle as a gift and thought it was lovely.the burning time and scent was excellent. I was so pleased with it I bought another candle recently. However this candle was not as good. The problem was that the wick melted the wax unevenly, I think the wick may have been off centre so a lot of the wax didn't burn. I had used it in exactly the same place as the previous candle so I know the conditions were the same. 
This was a bit disappointing but I must say that the scent was still as lovely so I will be buying the candle again.
Superb product, as always, very prompt delivery, l love you people x
I absolutely love the smell of this candle. I didn't think it could work but when I light it on an evening after 15 mins the whole house smells of it so refreshing well done Mugler

THE CANDLE IS IN THE SHAPE OF A STAR.
IT SMELLS AMAZING JUST LIKE THE ANGEL PARFUM.
WHEN I USED THE CANDLE FOR THE FIRST TIME THE ENTIRE HOUSE WAS FILLED WITH ANGEL XX IM SO IN LOVE WITH THIS CANDLE .. ANGEL IS MY FAVOURITE PERFUME AND ONLY EVER WEAR THAT..I LOVE BUYING THE LIMITED ADDITION PARFUM BOTTLES .
I bought this candle for a friend for Xmas. She said it was her favourite present! She said the candle looks lovely and the smell is amazing and lingers round the whole house.
Lovely smell, lasts all day. Would buy again . Good present

quick delivery, very good packaging.
Candle smells heavenly
Easy to order. Arrived on time. Nicely packaged. My daughter was delighted as a Christmas gift.
The item came broken. Not enough care taken into shipping and handling.

Ordered online, the order process was quick & easy, delivery was very fast arrived before date specified & you got email with time & date of arrival.
Fantastic product at a fantastic price, will buy again & recommend to others

Bought one for my mum too. I find it useful as it displays and keeps safe. No more looking for my angel.
Maybe a little overpriced for what it is, that would be my only negative feedback

column7: I use to have this perfume years ago and this years I told to myself to buy one of my favourite perfume so first I my mind come my love and only one Angel .When I received my Angel box I feel I feel in love again with this smell.Absolutly goldgest .Thanks Mugler .

column6: What a box this the best yet I have bought
column7: THIS IS A STUNNING BOX EVERYTHING ABOUT THIS BOX IS STUNNING. I HAVE BOUGHT THIS FOR A XMAS PRESENT. SHE WILL BE OVER THE MOON WITH IT. SO SO WELL PRESENTED. THANKYOU SO MUCH

Absolutely stunning set of Angel products. The set was packaged beautifully & much larger than anticipated. It was so lovely to have the hair perfume in the set to as I've only ever purchased that separately. This has been my favourite set so far of my all time favourite perfume. The only thing that could be improved for me is if you would duplicate this gorgeous set in my joint favourite Innocent. Many thanks x
Angel is very special to my mother and I buy her gifts sets every year. This one was fabulous, the first box she's ever kept! Truly a wonderful gift
Please please please tell me when these will be back in stock ???????

Received 9/12 passed on as a gift, was informed 1 was broken, contacted mugler 10/12, on 21/12 email saying they was sending out a replacement,9/1 telephoned to query where the replacement was and have since run out so offered alternative or refund (opted for alternative), upon checking see there had a been a refund issued on 5/1, no communication from company stating there had been no more stock or refund either, let the company know I had been issued a refund, so no replacement. It seems different departments do not communicate. Will not be dealing with this company again, exactly a month and I had to do all the chasing, stay well away

column6: Three different candles, three different scents
column7:
Bought these after being impressed by the alien candle (the single one). It smelled just like the scent and filled the house with fragrance even before it was lit!

Each of the candles here is based on a different ‘wave’ of angel - slightly disappointing as was expecting three mini angel EDP flavoured candles!

I - fresh and clean linen smelling, my second favourite.
II - I am reminded of pop corn and chocolate - my least favourite!
III - vanilla/patchouli - I guess it’s kinda seductive and defo my favourite!

These were a bargain as it was Black Friday and I had a discount t code on top of that! I won’t be buying again, I’ll get the big star candle next, hoping it smells just like my beloved angel EDP perfume!

As always, beautifully packaged and presented!
Poor. Have bought these candles for years ago and thought they were great. Strong smelling and long lasting. Well no longer. They appear to have changed the intensity of the smell.
If you love the original Angel perfume you will love these candles. Great for a romantic night for two.

super candles. Excellent fargrance scents the whole house.
Excellent buy highly recommended

Wonderful smell just like the perfume, recommend these 100%.
Great Christmas gifts.
Great candles at a good price. Lovely gift with excellent prompt delivery

column7: Good quality product in a delighful bottle. The scent is fresh, fun and fabulous
Every time I wear Aura I always get compliments it’s such a lovely smell and it’s lasts all day.

very beautiful scent it remindeds me of a flower on the planet i was trying to visit 400 years ago it song every night only at tight and the sky would turn green the fairies and pixies would come out and dance to it's song, the people of this world are interesting peaceful race they dreamfast with each other showing each other past. the perfume returned my memories of my friends on the planet thraa, i shall return to them with my aura which looks like a part of my magical staff once my tardis is fixed and im with my friends we will continue to explore perfumes, treasures of strange new worlds.

I have never smelt a fragrance like this. It is very unique and it smells absolutely amazing! It is not that intense and is up their with my absolute favourites. Another stunning new fragrance from Mugler!
Found my new love ,sexy ,deep and flirty ..happiness in a love shaped bottle !
I ordered this as an alternative to Angel(which I love), Aura is just as perfect.

This is my absolute favourite fragrance in the world! I received tons of compliments and going out to a club or on the streets, so many people turned around or asked me about the perfume. 
I love it and never want to buy any other one, because it gives me an identity.

I RECEIVED A SAMPLE OF EAU DE PARFUM "AURA MUGLER" AND I JUST WANTED TO LET YOU KNOW WHAT I TOUGHT AS I WASN'T SURE WHERE TO POST A REVIEW. 
I LOVED THE SMELL, IT'S ADDICTIVE AND IT STAYS ON FOR A LONG PERIOD OF TIME. ALSO THE PACKAGE ITSELF LOOKS REALLY CLASSY.
I WILL FOR SURE BUY ONE FOR ME NOW. 
THANK YOU FOR THE OPPORTUNITY TO TRY IT.
I love this stuff - you only need a little squirt on your wrist and it stays with you all day. Gorgeous scent.

Since smelling this scent fell in love with it and since wearing it have recieved nothing but compliments. A truly unique perfume , it is first Mugler perfume I have bought and won’t go back to other perfumes of which I have many.

Makes all other perfumes pointless this is just a feast for the senses The beauty of the bottle ( colour of my birthstone) is also a rare treat.

Bought a bottle of Aura Mugler on recent holiday flight as there was 15% offer. As I'd previously had a sample in a magazine and loved it so much. Am so pleased with choice as it's even more special.
Have been a fan of Mugler for years and love the perfumes, unique and lasting.

Have many people complementing when worn. So lovely and stunning bottle.
I will be definitely purchasing the refill in due course.
Thanks for manufacturing such class in a glass
Sadly I am still waiting for the delivery 3 weeks later. Have asked for my money back. You use DPD who are not capable of delivering anything as far a I can tell

Am fairly new to the range, have Alien and recently brought Aura.
Aura is the one have been wearing at work this week and have had many complements.

I am in love with this perfume. It is such a rich,revitalising,invigorating scent in a stunning bottle. I have had so many compliments on the scent and will be definately be buying refills ! I can also recommend angel and angel muse which are also stunning
Love the soft scent this perfume has. Always a lovely looking bottle too!!
Easy to order, super fast delivery. Brilliant free samples of different products and perfumes to try, excellent service.

I have been an Angel fan since 1995 and my husband loves it. I had tried the Aura fragrance at John Lewis before Xmas but wasn’t sure with the initial smell, but after a few hours the fragrance changed and now I really appreciate the skill of the designers and find this is my “ go to “ perfume and wear it daily. Have had some lovely comments about this intriguing scent, and the bottle design is fabulous.
Love this fragrance from the mugler range .Love the bottle all the mugler products are uniqie ,theres nothing else like them .

I had a sample of this that was given along with my online clothing order and as soon as I smelt it I fell in love with this scent. It was such a subtle sexy scent that I fell in love with it and went to the site and bought it. It reminds me of nature and the bottle is absolutely gorgeous. It's perfect for me.

column6: Did you know there are only two types of purfume?
column7:
So here is the explanation.

The basis is from a male perspective and yes ladies I know you will say there are thousands.

So here is the reasoning behind my statement that the Aura is in the one group of the two types of perfume.

When a girl or lady passes you with the one series perfume you turn to look who is wearing it, you may even ask if it seems not too forward, what the is the name of the perfume. This is how I came to find Aura!

I will be buying this for my wife on Valentines day.

David

Amaizing , loads of extra present . Very quick delivery 
Fantastic . My cusin is really happy. Thank You

Bought this new perfume for my wife as a Christmas present
She absolutely loves it and it’s now her new favourite.
Aura lasts all day and everyone comments how nice it is.

This fragrance is absolutely sublime , there isn’t a. Fragrance that Thierry Mugler does that I don’t love but this is my new favourite , the jewel that it comes in is totally gorgeous, if you only buy one perfume this year , make it this one.

Really amazing perfume. Smell's lovley and last's a very longtime. I wore it while out for dinner and didnt need to top up. I am usually out for dinner for around 2-3 hours including a walk after. 
So for an Idea it last's a good few hours and it smell's great!
Pefect present xx

Bought it for my wife for Christmas. She already loves Alien so gambled she would like this. It wasnt a gamble, it is a stunning scent. Really unique and instantly recognisable, it lasts a long time on the skin. My wife tells me it changes through the day the longer she wears it, she loves that. Great packaging, free testers and rapid delivery....buy this, you wont be disappointed.
Have been using mugler parfums for years and they just get better
Fantastic new fragrance I love it just as much as angel and alien !
Purchased for my daughter who usually uses Angel. She loved it allowing her to adapt the scent to match her mood or an event.
This perfume is georeous and lasts all day I love it

I was not into this perfume at all. Right away I felt that the scent was to strong and it kind of reminds me of much older women. The oriental and botanical just did not do it for me at all. It definitely has staying power and I'm sure some people will enjoy this perfume but it is just not my cup of tea.

I received this as a free sample for the purpose of writing a review.

Pleased with the purchase and the delivery was very quick. Slightly disappointed that the free message wasnt done as it was a present to my wife. Plus the PayPal option never worked to purchase and took me a long time to buy online. I wasn't too sure if the payment had gone through and was worried that I had bought several bottles!

So in love with this perfume...i thought I loved alien but this is my go to perfume..it smells divine and I had a great speedy service when ordering from the website with regular updates and a special offer...what more could a girl want!!! Keep it going Mr Mugler;) x
WAS BOUGHT THIS AURA PERFUME BUT I MUST SAY PREFER MY ANGEL WHICH IVE BEEN WEARING FOR YEARS AND PEOPLE DO SAY SHE IS IN THE BUILDING .
I have recently received a free sample of Aura which I really love I am hoping that my partner will buy me it for my Xmas, hint, hint

column6: Ripped Off With Offer Of Free Gifts
column7: Bought this plus some other items online with the offer of some smaller free gifts. Despite a phone call and 2 emails to the. I received no response. Don’t be fooled by this offer!

I love this parfum, is my favourite and will happily recomande to my friends. Every time I have a sample or miniatures from you I give it to my friends to try them, then they already order them from you or buy them from shops.

Just got AURA MUGLER for my Birthday. This one and all the magic around Mugler Brand... The perfume strong scent of forest and is very very light , talking about the notes but is also never ending bottle - one of those that last forever. I got the big one and I never get disappointing from these brand definitely. Just for the occasion ,and Christmas is coming I'm gonna wear it with pleasure.

First came across this scent from a sample in a magazine. Loved it totally. Never chosen Mugler scent before. Found tester in Boots but found everywhere standard price of £70.00.
Visited Mugler website and was able to purchase Scent which then came with free gift-makeup bag and minature showergel, body lotion , scent and notepad (not sure on the notepad though!) plus other samples.
Very very pleased.

L'eau de parfum Aura Mugler has notes of delicate botanical scents that surpass any other perfume ever created. It is sensual, mystical and wrap you with a sense of wonder. It takes you to a world that only the imagination allows you to go. A true gift.

I didn't think there would ever be a nicer perfume than Angel but I am so glad to be proven wrong.
This really is a very vibrant and alluring fragrance.
I Love It.

I have used Mugler products since they came on sale in the UK this fragrance is so beautiful it is so hard for me to choose what Mugler perfumes to wear from day to day but know I have this new one things change you have to try it for yourself it is so beautiful,

I am an Angel lady and have been for a very long time. Angel will always be my favourite but this now comes a very close second. Have loads of compliments when I wear it and the aroma lasts for a long time so no need to keep topping it up. Go ahead and treat yourself as you will not be disappointed.
I am a Mugler fan and loved every fragrance until I purchased this one, it does not suit me and smells almost medicinal on my skin, like mouthwash..I gave it to my mother who it suits more.

column6: If you like Angel you will love Aura
column7: I have rated Angel as my favourite fragrance for so long. But now Aura has come along and I am torn between the two. However you choose you must have both, you cannot prefer one over the other. I sent Aura to my daughter in the USA for her birthday, She loves it two.
My favourite was Ailen but this new one beats it. Only need a few squirts and scent lasts all day. Not overpowering. Bit pricey but we are all worth it.

Lovely perfume, have had comments from people who never have commented before, definitely for the lady that loves the Mugler range but fancies having a more mature scent. I'm 41, love Angel, & Alien.
But I'm in love with the new AURA.
Absolutely love this partum... my fav so far xxxxx

I collect all the mugler fragrances so I
Was super excited to see this new release aura! Wow I wasn't disappointed! It's strong,powerful,woody and wonderful! I
Also treated myself to the body lotion!
My husband bought me this as a gift as I always wear Alien. I really like this one too, would recommend it
love my purchase of aura,perfect for romatic evenings out,really classical,one of my favourite perfumes,would definately buy again.
This new fragrance is perfect for the younger person.A youthful perfume.

Well done guys.!!! Yet another wonderful fragrance. I already have,the original Star, Innocent Rock, Muse and Cologne. Always get stopped by both people that I know and total strangers and complemented on what perfume I have on.

column6: Terrific bottle design and nice smell
column7: The bottle design is astonishing! Shining like emerald! A blind buy for its design. I wasn't keen to the top note at the beginning, but after a while , I changed my mind completely! The longer it leaves the better it smells, the middle note is so plaseant and long lasting! It worths any single penny !

Freshness to fit perfect into every woman's heart.. Leaves your heart fluttering with every captivating scent throughout the day. Heart shaped bottle is definitely my favourite in the Mugler range.. Love It !!!

I have used Angel and Alien perfume ever since they were introduced in South Africa and absolutely love them and always receive compliments when wearing them so was excited to try Aura but sadly it doesn't 'last' on me and no one has commented on it. The bottle is beautiful.

Yet another lovely perfume by Theiry Mugler...just wish I had bought off line , unfornately my broadband was playing up, So bought from a reputable dept Store in in Gy Yarmouth. Wasn't disappointed, I managed to buy the last one . Would have been nice to receive complimentary samples which is given on line .
Excellent product. Great service. Couldn't ask for more!
This new scent from Mugler is lovely being both sweet and fresh at the same time. The only thing which I would change if possible would be to increase the length of time that the scent lasts.

Great perfume. I bought it for a change from Alien. It smells great and there is a hint of violet ( the sweets you can buy) I don't think it lasts as long as Alien, but it is lovely and unlike the smell of any other perfume I have had.
I love it. long lasting. amazing smell. Will buy a bigger bottle next time as I just got the 30ml. Love it . sexy, feminine .

I ordered the 90ml aura and it came super quickly and had loads of free samples and accessories. The perfume smells so beautiful and I wear it everyday with loads of compliments. The only issue I have is I can't get on The Circle part of the website to put my code in.

I am a lover of all Thierry Mugler fragrances and I wear Angel day/ night for years. It is as many friends will agree my signature fragance.
I saw that Aura had been launched and tried it in my local department store.
I came home and placed an order online so pleased and it is lovely to wear and last day into night.i find it is not too heavy and is a lovely fresh smell. Stunning fragrance, beautiful bottle and I can see me wearing Aura for the a long time with the additional products. I really hope this wonderful addition to the Thierry Mugler Collection is here to stay.
Lovely fresh smelling perfume.. Thierry Mugler never lets me down! The smell last all day and its not over powering. This will definentely be added to my favorite list!!

So pleased with this delightful fragrance. Was given a free sample to try and loved it so much I bought a bottle. Long lasting scent which leaves you feeling fresh all day. Love the gem shaped bottle and was pleased to discover it can be refilled!

I love the smell of this, it's my new fav. People have also commented on how good I smell. I would recommend this to anyone and I was one of the first to buy it nobody I know had heard of it but they do now.
This is an amazing parfume smells out of this world.
Wow what a fab fragrance lasts & lasts love The bottle to highly recommend.

The smell lingers in rooms when I wear it and people comment how gorgeous this perfume is. Would highly recommend this aura as I believe that when you wear perfume, people should take note of how beautiful you smell, cause what's the point in wearing it if they don't.

Absolutely love this new scent! Bottle is decadent - the scent is divine! Receiving lots of compliments when I wear this. Defo buying again!

column5: AURA MUGLER Eau de Parfum Sensuelle
column7: Aura Sensuelle comes in the most stunning bottle and the beauty doesn’t end there. For me, this has to be the unicorn of the fragrance world. It’s floral but sweet and ever so lightly musky, and if like me you love Gardenia then that’s the floral note I get the most from this fragrance.  Not something I would ever have dreamed I’d like to wear (but I fell in love with the bottle immediately!) it’s sensual, but for me it invokes all kinds of childhood memories of smells like Play Doh (one of my favourite smells in the universe), Parma Violets and fancy sweet shops that sell Crème Parisiennes…! I find it magical, delicious and intoxicating … this could become my new scent addiction.

column6: Product was good but poor customer service
column7: Perfume set was perfect but the service was really poor, no receipt on purchase, no delivery information i waited nearly 3 days for a response to chase up my order to be given a fake delivery tracking number than 5 days later it turned up via royal mail next day delivery, so wasn't even posted for a week from order.. will buy product again but definitely not from this website. If your thinking your being sensible buying direct from manufacturer but truth of the matter is only order if your not in a rush and don't need customer services

column7:
Decided on this product as a Christmas present for my partner. After shopping around and comparing prices it became clear that the official Mugler website was actually cheaper than the retailers selling the same products (Mugler had a 20% off promotion at the time). To make the deal even sweeter I was able to select a number of free gifts (6 or 7 if I recall correctly) at the end of the purchase such as small sample perfumes etc. That's a nice touch, and one you don't often get from other retailers. My partner loves all those wee extra bottles etc, so it was a nice to be able to choose those for her. 

The gift set itself looks really nice and stylish. I can't comment too much on the fragrance as I'm bloke, but what I can say is that it's my partner's favourite brand and over the years I've purchased a number of Mugler perfumes for her including Alien, Womanity, and the one that looks like a star etc. The bottles, moreover the gift sets always look good and very original, and Aura is no exception to this.

In short I'm very happy with my purchase and would have no hesitation recommending this to other men looking to buy a gift for their wife/partner.
column20: Perfume > Women's Perfume > Aura Mugler Perfume > Sets

column7: Love it, love it, love it - so many compliments and comments. From strangers when I am wearing this. Definitely in my favourites list. You really feel like you have a beautiful aura when wearing this.
column20: Perfume > Women's Perfume > Aura Mugler Perfume > Sets

column7:
I ordered the product having seen an on line advert and compared the deal with various others! The clincher for me was the offer of 3 MUGLER samples of my choice which NEVER arrived!
I got an email from the delivery company to say that they would deliver on a certain day, as I was working I gave them a ‘safe place’ to leave the product. When I got home from work PANIC, my package wasn’t in it’s safe place, tried to contact the delivery company, no joy, tried to track it online, no joy, I eventually contacted MUGLER as I believed my package had been stolen. They looked into it and said it was due for delivery the next day??? So good job I hadn’t stayed at home for the delivery the previous day, and good job my parcel hadn’t been stolen. But that feeling that Night was awful and could’ve easily been avoided be emailing me CORRECT information about delivery days!
In future if I buy a MUGLER product I’ll buy it in store!
column20: Perfume > Women's Perfume > Aura Mugler Perfume > Sets

I love the product itself and have used it since its launch. 
However, I am now nearing the end of the container and find it difficult to get the last of it out. The container is fairly rigid so difficult to squeeze. Also, because it is a solid container its also difficult to tell if there is anything worth trying to squeeze out.
I would say its a no-go for anyone with any form of arthritis in their hands as it could mean they are definitely unable to get the last of the product out of the container.

ONE FROM THE BEST PERFUMES EVER, I LOVE ALL OF THE PERFUMES OF T.M., BUT THIS ONE IS EVEN MORE SPECIAL...
a beautiful perfume,always reminds me of my daughter,she has used it for the last ten years.and she adores it.

Ths was my first purchase from TM and will not be my last. Ordering online was quick and easy. The perfume arrived within a week. The perfume was package so nicely and in pretty wrap paper too. The thing that also impressed me was the way in which the box was able to be opened which left it able to be re-sealed should I wish to return it. Also inside was a pre-paid returns label which would have made returning this a hassle free action. I wont be returning this perfume because it is lovely and very good value for money. I will be sure to buy from TM again. Very Happy!

I used to use this perfume years ago and was really disappointed when it was no longer available in the shops. Thinking that was the end of that, I ‘mourned’ the loss of it and carried on. Years later, did a google search and et viola! Found it - and on the official Mugler website too, not some dodgy site that you wouldn’t be confident that you were getting the real thing. It was out of stock for over a month but I checked back nearly every day until I was finally able to get a bottle.
Really unique smell that I find a little less harsher than the Angel smell. So glad that ‘we’re finally reunited’

I have used Innocence for several years now & always get compliments when I wear it. I believe its only available from the Thierry Muggler website now, which is not a problem as the price is good & the service excellent. Innocent is a perfume for day or evening. Not too heavy. Not flowery or musky just heavenly! Try it you won't be disappointed.

I placed an order, paid and 4 days later was sent an email saying my order was cancelled. Found out after a few emails back and forth and more days waiting that apparently because I live in Australia, I am unable to buy this as a gift for someone in the UK, with a UK address. Very unhelpful and ridiculous, not to mention a complete waste of my time. They even just sent me an email asking me to write a review on my purchase, to silly to realise that it was cancelled. Shame, because this perfume was unable to be sourced elsewhere, so really stupid policy. No one wins in this situation, time to review your own company. I have loved Innocent for over 25 years, put it back in the stores so it can be purchased easily.

Innocent still remains my favourite but I appreciate the chance to try some different ones - well you never know, I could be introduced to a new favourite, just not this time!

Was delighted when I saw this to buy online as I was so disappointed when I could not find this in any store to buy. This is my favourite fragrance with Alien a close second. Was also impressed at the quickness this was delivered to me. Great service
Beautiful, fresh fragrance. My favorite scent, very pleased to find it again on the Mugler website! Delivered very quickly, will recommend to friends and family.

Recommend

Opening notes are sweet and then it changes to a beautiful bouquet of thousands of flowers, it is a massive bouquet, beautifully put together and not heavy at all. column7: I purchased this two weeks ago and I absolutely love it, the scent is gorgeous and does last.

I bought this box a couple of weeks ago and was delighted with the contents. It was well worth the price and I especially liked that you could get items not usually available on the Mugler UK website such as the eye liner stickers. The hair fragrance usually retails at £25, so the box was excellent value for money. I hope Mugler create more of these boxes soon as I would most definitely purchase.

I couldn't wait for my Mugler Box to arrive, but perhaps I shouldn't have got my hopes up because I was, to be honest, disappointed. Not with the Hair Mist, but with the so-called "surprise accessory" which turned out to be some rather tacky eye patches. I wondered why the Alien Box had 2 "surprises" but the Angel only had 1? 
Sadly, unless the contents of the Angel Box are upgraded, I would not buy another one. It's a shame because I would probably have bought my daughters these as well.

column6: More than disappointed - very poor product
column7:
I had previously purchased one of these boxes and was really happy with the gifts included. 

However, this one included a full size hair mist as promised but, the duo shower and milk were a 30ml sample size, I wasn't expecting full size but was expecting 50ml. The minature perfume was Angel Muse rather than Angel and the surprise - 2 eyeliner patches, just what I wanted - NOT!

There was a voucher code so that, if I spend another £45 by the end of March '18, I will receive a surprise. I think I've had enough surprises thanks.

I'm considering returning it as it is a very poor purchase.

column6: It's about as strong as water!

I'll definitely buy from here as it's cheaper than anywhere else! The packaging is devine( black tissue and a glossy wallet with your receipt in it- nice touch) and I get to choose a lot of samples ( Hot Cologne....beyond words....want more..) want a light summer unisex fragrance? this is it.

P.S.

This product was bought solely because:
(a) the Thierry Mugler website had no Cologne for sale (and, at the time of writing, still doesn't) in stand-alone bottles;

column7: What a bargain, my husband loves this and,as always, fantastic service from the team at mugler.

If you REALLY valued my review and customer comments you would allow Mugler.co.uk online shop to sell the cologne shower gel (douch tonique ) and other cologne products as well.
Or even get Clarins to have the product available in the other country I live in South Africa.
You guys make it so hard to buy this product online or anywhere in UK or SA.
Years ago I even wrote to Mr. Mugler himself in Paris, but never ever had a reply.
I do not suppose I will even hear back from this review.

Nigel Fossey
column20: Perfume > Women's Perfume > Mugler Cologne > Fragrances

column7:
Or all year round. I've been wearing Mugler Cologne for a few years now and I have lost count of all the compliments I've received over that time.
It's fresh, zingy and long lasting, becoming more subtle with time. I have looked for similar fresh fragrances and have yet to find one that delivers, especially at the price. I believe it works better when the weather is warmer, spring and summer but it also works when the weather is cold and dull by giving you a summery feeling and lift your mood. Highly recommended.

Gorgeous perfume. Please bring this back. Miss it already Nothing else compares.

column6: Unique & never copied but sadly discontinued
column7:
I am such a Mugler addict.

Even though I'm a guy, I wear Angel, Alien, A*men and Womanity. Gender labels on fragrances don't worry me at all. If I like the fragrance, I'll wear it.

Womanity is such a stand-out fragrance, and cannot be matched. Nothing else is like it. The salty sea-spray / ozone notes with the leafy but sweet and fruity fig make it stand out in a crowd.
Its got a freshly snapped celery stick, wet and juicy element to it, too.

It's all a weird combination, but it really works.

It's something I wear when I want to give off a "I'm in the room" vibe, come and have a chat with me mood. Saying that, it really is potent. Even though I like huge fragrances that leave a lasting trail behind me, I treat Womanity with care.
A spray too much and you'll know about it! I'm not saying this in a complaining way, but that Womanity needs to be handled with care. It really lasts. I mean REALLY LASTS.

It's such a shame that Womanity is now discontinued. It is unique. Unique to the definition of the word. We have no fall-back that is similar.

When my last bottle has gone, I'll miss the sheer individuality of it.

I hope that Mugler / Clarins consider making this an online exclusive, like Innocent is.
Shame if this stand-out fragrance dies forever.

Keep Womanity going, PLEASE!

column6: So disappointed this has been discontinued
column7: I have now exhausted all other avenues (and every duty free I have visited as soon as I was told it was being discontinued!!) to replace my last 2 bottles of this beautiful fragrance I do not want to wear it everyday as I fear not ever getting it again - nothing comes close nor have I ever had so many complements on how lovely my fragrance is from complete strangers!! I echo other reviews to keep this as an online exclusive.

This was the best perfume ever, can't get over the fact it's been discontinued.
tried everywhere to get a bottle or refill my bottles, even asked everywhere I went in the USA with no luck .
Bring it back PLEASE x
Very disappointed that Womanity has been discontinued. Went to try the new Aura today and it definitely is not a good replacement!

I went into Debenhams last week to get my husband to buy my Christmas present which I aphave had for the last 4 years to be told that Womanity has been discontinued and after reading all of the reviews on this site is is very obvious I am not the only one disappointed,thankfully it seems to still be available on here but for how long will be available,can anyone let me know?
Angel was my original favourite,the Angel innocent and now Alien and Womanity I don't wear any other fragrances so I am complete obsessed a Mulgar fan,please bring Womanity back!

I am really disappointed that this fragrance has been discontinued. It is so unusual & different to all other generic & boring fragrances out there. I love how different this is to anything else! I have not come across anything else that comes even close to replicating this fragrance. Please at least make this an online exclusive as you have done with Innocent! Please listen to your customers Clarins!

This fragrance always turned heads.

so very disappointed that its been discontinued.

I used to buy it so boys will turn their heads around after me. Well I loved this perfume so on the list of one of my favorites, definitely. But what's interesting here I wouldn't wear it during winter.

Why have you discontinued Womanity? It is my absolute favourite and I have been wearing it for the last six years. I have had so many compliments on it. Please bring it back there is no other fragrance I love as much.Sa

Why, why, why, oh why have you discontinued this fabulous perfume. I have in my 59 years tried lots of fragrances but this one is made for me!! Please bring it back or let me know if there is something identical being produced.

This is one of the best perfumes out there!
I have been using womanity for the past 12 years , and i feel so gutted you have disscontinued it ¬!
please bring this back!!!
I’ve have just won a gift voucher , I chose a Debenhams voucher so I could treat myself to Womanity. And it’s gone. So gutted.

I am gutted and devastated that Womanity has been discontinued. This has been my signature fragrance for the last 6 years - whenever I wear it people stop me and ask what am I wearing. It is also one of the few perfumes that seem to linger on my body as many just seem to disappear really quickly. If I had known it was stopping I would have stock piled on it. I was never overly keen on the bottle design finding it a bit gothic and wonder if that put people off buying it? A couple of times I thought about going for a different fragrance but always came back to this one as it just suited me so well. 

I

column6: Best Perfume I've ever owned - Discontinued?
column7: This has been my favourite perfume I have ever, ever owned. The smell is one of a kind, nothing can beat it. Once settled it smells so beautiful on the skin. I am so upset this hasnt been available for so long? Please bring it back....
absolutely unique and gorgeous, womanity will always be my favourite perfume. Please bring this back, aura is absolutely no match for womanity...
So upset they have stopped making this perfume, lets hope the new Aura perfume doesnt sell and they BRING BACK WOMANITY !

adore this fragrance and can not understand why this is discontinued !
Please reconsider for all Womanity devotees.

I have been wearing this gorgeous perfume for many years and am gutted that it is being discontinued. As I'm no longer able to buy it from the high street I was hoping that the Mugler site would allow me to be able to still buy from them. Out of all the Mugler perfumes this is by far the only one that I would happily wear each day. I'm constantly being asked what it is that I wear as others think it smells lovely too.

column6: Why oh why has this been discontinued!
column7:
Wonderful fragrance now discontinued, I believe. 
Most perfumes have "something close or good enough" that can take the place of a much loved fragrance when it's no longer available. 
Not Womanity - totally unique - no other perfume comes anywhere near.

Absolutely love this perfume, always have and I am truly devastated that it is no longer being made/is available once the stocks have gone. I have recommended it in the questions above, but don't know why as if it is no longer available it does seem a bit pointless. I have worn this perfume for years, it is probably my favourite Thierry Mugler perfume, although I do love all of them, I just can't believe you are no longer making it.
Excellent product, order was completed and processed quickly and efficiently and product received about 3 days later, excellent service as always.

I do feel, however, this latest bottle of Womanity doesn't last as long on me as previous bottles of it, as if it's a bit weaker?

I just love this perfume but it is so difficult to get the refills so I end up buying new bottles all the time

column6: My favourite perfume back in stock!

column6: Womanity is back for a short time online!!
column7:
I am so thrilled to have Womanity back online at the moment!
 I have asked Customer Services to pass on to Head Office that it is the best fragrance of all Mugler creations and to bring it back for good.
I cannot believe you have discontinued Womanity! It's the only fragrance that I'm truly devoted to. As someone else said, I got asked all the time what perfume I'm wearing. Please, bring it back!!!

I have been wearing Womanity from the time it was first produced, it is the most beautiful perfume and I constantly receive compliments, both from strangers and people I know because it smells so gorgeous. I was therefore completely taken aback to discover recently that it has been discontinued, do Mugler not understand that this is a perfume that is incredibly popular and much loved, nearly all of my friends use it having smelt it on me. I received an e-mail from Mugler this morning advertising an offer on their perfume, Womanity was included within the list, I eagerly clicked onto it in the hope that I could purchase a bottle before it is no longer available to discover that it is 'Out Of Stock', why maintain it on the website if your customers can no longer purchase it? So disappointed and upset that this perfume is no longer available, I really feel Mugler have been very short sighted.
I am disappointed that this fragrance has been discontinued, I hope Mugler has a rethink and brings it back. It has been my favourite for a long time. Nothing equals it.

So sorry to learn you have discontinued this perfume I just loved
it. Please bring it back in the future.
This scent is magical, seductive and unique. I love it so very, very much. Today I learned it has been discontinued. I am bereft.

I am gutted that Womanity has been discontinued, it has been my signature scent since it started in 2010, it has many memories attached to this scent like Holidays and the kind comments I receive from people who also like this. Please bring it back :-(

Many comments have been made when I wear it. I was very sad to hear it is discontinued, but hope I am still able to purchase this in time to come.

I'm very happy with this perfume however i couldn't find any of that in the perfume shop I've been told that is not on the market anymore but I found your shop on internet and I can wares that amazing smell again

My favourite fragrance of all time...EVER and I learn that it has been discontinued! Just cannot understand why? WHY?! Please Thierry, please change your mind! There is nothing out there to compare with the rare, sweet, salty deliciousness of 'Womanity'. Please don't take it away....sob....
I love this perfume so much please bring it back. The smell is amazing

column6: So Love this perfum please don't discontinue

Their eventual response :

"Thank you for kindly providing your order number. We have reviewed your order information and unfortunately your Womanity Eau de Parfum 80ml has not successfully been customised with an engraving message.
 
Please accept our apologies for any disappointment caused on this occasion."

You decide if that's good customer services ...

I love this perfume Ive been wearing it for the last 7 year so I'm absolutely gutted it is being discontinued as it's the only perfume I wear, Ive been stocking up before I can't get anymore ☹️

Timeless, classic, elegant, mischievous, heady, with a hint of darkness...... Absolutely my favourite perfume at the moment... in fact ever! So disappointed to hear that Mugler are discontinuing it.

People always remark beautiful smell what are you wearing Angel would not wear anything else.

The "tote" bag that comes with it, is in fact a fake leather bag, which looks like a handbag. Can't believe it was all £31, it is worth so much more. The only downside, is the codes on the products don't work :)
